name: Indiscriminate Wrath
html:
Indiscriminate Wrath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, invoker, Covenant of Wrath class feature
Benefit : When you use your armor of wrath power, you can target each enemy in the burst, rather than only the triggering enemy.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 141.

name: Invoker’s Aura
html:
Invoker’s Aura

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, invoker
Benefit : Until the end of your next turn, after you use a Channel Divinity power, any enemy within 2 squares of you that hits you or any enemy that ends its turn within 2 squares of you takes radiant damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier. No enemy can take this damage more than once per turn.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 141.

name: Paladin’s Truth
html:
Paladin’s Truth

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, paladin
Benefit : When you attack a creature marked by you, you ignore that creature’s resistances and immunities.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 141.

name: Shield Proficiency: Heavy
html:
Shield Proficiency: Heavy

Prerequisite : Strength 15, proficiency with light shields
Benefit : You gain proficiency with heavy shields.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 200, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 316, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 317.

name: Pious Champion
html:
Pious Champion

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, paladin, call of virtue or lay on hands power
Benefit : When you use your call of virtue or lay on hands, you can target one or two creatures. If you target two creatures with lay on hands, you spend one healing surge and each target regains hit points as normal for the power.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 142.

name: Protecting Boon
html:
Protecting Boon

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Cha 21, Str 15, paladin, divine mettle power
Benefit : When you use your divine mettle, you can target each ally in the burst.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 142.

name: Punishing Radiance
html:
Punishing Radiance

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, any divine class
Benefit : Whenever you score a critical hit with a divine attack power that has the radiant keyword, the target and each enemy within 5 squares of it gain vulnerable 10 radiant (or its existing vulnerability to radiant damage increases by 10) until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 142.

name: Radiant Advantage
html:
Radiant Advantage

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, cleric
Benefit : When you deal radiant damage to an enemy, you and your allies gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Reactive Healing
html:
Reactive Healing

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, cleric, healing word power
Benefit : You can use your healing word as an immediate reaction, triggered when an ally within 5 squares of you drops to 0 hit points or fewer. You must target the triggering ally with the healing word.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Righteous Focus
html:
Righteous Focus

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, Censure of Unity class feature, oath of enmity power
Benefit : While you are adjacent to your oath of enmity target, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against it.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Shared Healing
html:
Shared Healing

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, cleric
Benefit : When you use a power that allows an ally to spend a healing surge, you can instead have that ally regain hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge, and you or another willing ally within 5 squares of you spends the healing surge instead.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Supreme Healer
html:
Supreme Healer

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, cleric, healing word power
Benefit : When you use your healing word, you can heal two targets instead of one (either two allies or one ally and yourself ).

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Tireless Wrath
html:
Tireless Wrath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Str 21, Cha 15, paladin, divine strength power
Benefit : When you use your divine strength, the effect applies to all attacks you make until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Unbearable Malediction
html:
Unbearable Malediction

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, invoker, Covenant of Malediction class feature
Benefit : Whenever your maledictor’s doom power allows you to push a target, you can add one-half your Intelligence modifier to the number of squares pushed.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Shield Proficiency: Light
html:
Shield Proficiency: Light

Prerequisite : Strength 13
Benefit : You gain proficiency with light shields.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 200, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 316, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 317.

name: Vengeance Recalled
html:
Vengeance Recalled

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : When you miss with an avenger power against your oath of enmity target, you gain a +5 bonus to damage rolls against that target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Virtuous Company
html:
Virtuous Company

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Cha 21, Wis 15, paladin, divine mettle power
Benefit : When you use your divine mettle, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier for each ally who succeeds on a saving throw granted by this power.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Channel of Faith [Multiclass Cleric]
html:
Channel of Faith [Multiclass Cleric]

Prerequisite : Any multiclass cleric feat, paragon multiclassing as a cleric
Benefit : You gain the cleric Channel Divinity powers divine fortune and turn undead. If you don’t already have the Channel Divinity class feature, you can use a single Channel Divinity power once per encounter, and you’re considered to have the class feature for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Channel of Invocation [Multiclass Invoker]
html:
Channel of Invocation [Multiclass Invoker]

Prerequisite : Any multiclass invoker feat, paragon multiclassing as an invoker
Benefit : You gain the invoker Channel Divinity powers armor of wrath and preserver’s rebuke. If you don’t already have the Channel Divinity class feature, you can use a single Channel Divinity power once per encounter, and you’re considered to have the class feature for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 143.

name: Channel of Valor [Multiclass Paladin]
html:
Channel of Valor [Multiclass Paladin]

Prerequisite : Any multiclass paladin feat, paragon multiclassing as a paladin
Benefit : You gain the paladin Channel Divinity powers divine mettle and divine strength. If you don’t already have the Channel Divinity class feature, you can use a single Channel Divinity power once per encounter, and you’re considered to have the class feature for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Channel of Vengeance [Multiclass Avenger]
html:
Channel of Vengeance [Multiclass Avenger]

Prerequisite : Any multiclass avenger feat, paragon multiclassing as an avenger
Benefit : You gain the avenger Channel Divinity powers abjure undead and divine guidance. If you don’t already have the Channel Divinity class feature, you can use a single Channel Divinity power once per encounter, and you’re considered to have the class feature for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Divine Channeler [Multiclass]
html:
Divine Channeler [Multiclass]

Prerequisite : Wis 13, trained in Religion
Benefit : Choose a divine class other than your own and a Channel Divinity power available as a class feature for that class.
If you don’t already have the Channel Divinity class feature, you can use the selected Channel Divinity power once per day.
If you already have the Channel Divinity class feature, add the selected Channel Divinity power to your list of available Channel Divinity powers.
You are treated as having the Channel Divinity class feature for the purpose of meeting prerequisites. If you gain additional Channel Divinity powers by selecting divinity feats, you can use them in place of the power granted by this feat, but that doesn’t change your normal limit on uses of Channel Divinity.
Special : This feat counts as a class-specific multiclass feat for the chosen class.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Divine Healer [Multiclass Cleric]
html:
Divine Healer [Multiclass Cleric]

Prerequisite : Wis 15
Benefit : You gain training in the Heal skill. You gain the cleric’s Healer’s Lore class feature. In addition, you can wield cleric implements.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Divine Secretkeeper [Multiclass Invoker]
html:
Divine Secretkeeper [Multiclass Invoker]

Prerequisite : Wis 13, Int 13
Benefit : You gain training in the Arcana skill, the History skill, or the Religion skill.
You gain the invoker’s Ritual Casting class feature. In addition, you can wield invoker implements.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Hero of Faith [Multiclass Avenger]
html:
Hero of Faith [Multiclass Avenger]

Prerequisite : Wis 15
Benefit : You gain training in one skill from the avenger’s class skills list.
Once per encounter, you can use the oath of enmity power. The effect lasts until you hit the target or until the target drops to 0 hit points. You cannot switch the target or extend the duration of the power in any way.
In addition, you can wield avenger implements.


Addition (10/14/2009)
Add the following sentence to the second paragraph, between the first and second sentences:
“The effect lasts until you hit the target or until the target drops to 0 hit points.”

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Soldier of Virtue [Multiclass Paladin]
html:
Soldier of Virtue [Multiclass Paladin]

Prerequisite : Wis 15
Benefit : You gain training in one skill from the paladin’s class skills list.
Once per day, you can use the virtue’s touch power. In addition, you can wield paladin implements.

Published in Divine Power , page(s) 144.

name: Discipline Adept
html:
Discipline Adept

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Psion, Discipline Focus class feature
Benefit : You can use each power granted by your Discipline Focus twice per encounter.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 180.

name: Exchange Power
html:
Exchange Power

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Psion, Send Thoughts power
Benefit : When you use send thoughts to deliver a message to an ally who has power points, you can lose 1 power point to allow that ally to regain 1 power point.


Update (6/14/2010)
Replace “transfer 1 power point of yours to that ally” with “lose 1 power point to allow that ally to regain 1 power point.”

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 180.

name: Precise Mind
html:
Precise Mind

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Psion
Benefit : Whenever you hit with a psionic attack power that is augmented with 2 or more power points, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with psionic at-will attack powers that are unaugmented until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 182.

name: Dominating Mind
html:
Dominating Mind

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, psion
Benefit : Whenever you daze, dominate, or stun a creature with a psionic effect that a save can end, the creature takes a -2 penalty to its first saving throw against that effect.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 187.

name: Predictive Defense
html:
Predictive Defense

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, psion
Benefit : Whenever you hit an enemy with a psionic at-will attack power that is unaugmented, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against melee attacks until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 188.

name: Chill of the Grave
html:
Chill of the Grave

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : Your dark reaping racial power deals cold and necrotic damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39.

name: Dark Feasting
html:
Dark Feasting

Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : When you deal damage with your dark reaping, you gain temporary hit points equal to the extra necrotic damage dealt to the target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39, Heroes of Shadow , page(s) 157.

name: Death Curse
html:
Death Curse

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 13, revenant, Warlock’s Curse class feature
Benefit : When you deal the additional necrotic damage from your dark reaping racial power to a target under your Warlock’s Curse, all other creatures also under your Warlock’s Curse take necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39.

name: Death's Blessing
html:
Death's Blessing

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : You no longer need to eat, drink, or breathe, so you never need to make Endurance checks to resist the effects of starvation, thirst, and suffocation. You are no longer considered a living creature.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39.

name: Death's Quickening
html:
Death's Quickening

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : If you drop to 0 or fewer hit points and choose to remain conscious due to Unnatural Vitality, you can take a minor action in addition to the standard action Unnatural Vitality allows.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39.

name: Divine Fate  [Divinity]Divine Fate
html:
Divine Fate [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, Channel Divinity class feature
Benefit : You can invoke divine power to use divine fate.


Feat Utility Divine Fate

A great power has plans for you and turns chance in your favor.

Encounter Divine
Free Action Ranged 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : You or an ally fails a skill or ability check, or a saving throw

Effect : The target rerolls the check or saving throw, and takes the higher result.


Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39.

name: Draconic Reaping
html:
Draconic Reaping

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : Choose a damage type available in the dragon breath dragonborn racial power. Your dark reaping racial power and dragon breath racial power deal that damage type and necrotic damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 39.

name: Skill Focus
html:
Skill Focus

Prerequisite : Training in chosen skill
Benefit : Choose a skill in which you have training. You gain a +3 feat bonus to the chosen skill.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose a different skill.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 316, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 318.

name: Empowered Reaping
html:
Empowered Reaping

Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to the damage dealt by your dark reaping. This bonus increases to +4 at 11th level and +6 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 40, Heroes of Shadow , page(s) 157.

name: Half-Elf Soul
html:
Half-Elf Soul

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, revenant
Benefit : You gain the Dilettante half-elf racial feature (Player’s Handbook, page 42). In a given encounter, you can use the power you chose for Dilettante or your dark reaping racial power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 40.

name: Hellfire Soul
html:
Hellfire Soul

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, tiefling
Benefit : Your dark reaping racial power deals fire damage and necrotic damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Skill Training
html:
Skill Training

Benefit : You gain training in one skill, which doesn’t need to be on your class skills list.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose a different skill.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 317, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 318.

name: Human Soul
html:
Human Soul

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, revenant
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will defenses.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Life Thief
html:
Life Thief

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, rogue
Benefit : When you deal necrotic damage with your dark reaping racial power with an attack that also deals Sneak Attack damage, you can reroll each Sneak Attack damage die that shows a result of 1 or 2. Reroll until a given die has a result greater than 2.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Marked for Death
html:
Marked for Death

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 13, revenant, ability to mark a foe
Benefit : When you deal the necrotic damage from your dark reaping racial power to a target, other enemies marked by you take necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Minotaur Soul
html:
Minotaur Soul

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Minotaur, revenant
Benefit : When you fall unconscious due to having 0 hp or fewer, you can make a basic attack as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Past Life Flashbacks
html:
Past Life Flashbacks

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : Before you roll initiative, you can take a -10 penalty to your roll. If you do so, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and checks until the end of your first turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Reaper's Quarry
html:
Reaper's Quarry

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 13, revenant, ranger
Benefit : When you deal the necrotic damage from your dark reaping racial power to a target that is also your quarry, each attack that hits that target before the end of your next turn also deals extra necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Reaper's Resistance
html:
Reaper's Resistance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, Death’s Blessing feat
Benefit : You gain resist 5 necrotic. This increases to resist 10 necrotic at 11th level, and to resist 15 necrotic at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Remembered Knack
html:
Remembered Knack

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, any class-specific multiclassing feat that grants training in a skill
Benefit : You gain training in a skill on the class list of the class associated with your class-specific multiclassing feat. Additionally, you gain a +2 bonus to checks with that skill or the skill you gained training in from taking the class-specific multiclass feat.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Spectral Reaping
html:
Spectral Reaping

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant
Benefit : You ignore insubstantial with all damage from an attack with which you deal the necrotic damage from your dark reaping racial power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 41.

name: Death Scorned
html:
Death Scorned

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Con 13, revenant
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to death saving throws. You don’t die from failing death saving throws until you have rolled a number of failed death saving throws equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier(maximum 5).

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Alhahn’s Mindful Relocation
html:
Alhahn’s Mindful Relocation

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, Shifting Fortunes racial trait
Benefit : When you use your Shifting Fortunes, you can shift your speed, instead of 3 squares.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 177.

name: Dakshai’s Body-Mind Union
html:
Dakshai’s Body-Mind Union

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, iron mind racial power
Benefit : When you are subjected to an effect that a save can end, you can expend the use of your iron mind as an immediate interrupt to make a saving throw with a +5 bonus against that effect, instead of gaining the normal effect of iron mind.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 180.

name: Iron Resolve of Zerthadlun
html:
Iron Resolve of Zerthadlun

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai
Benefit : While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 181.

name: Miryath’s First Strike
html:
Miryath’s First Strike

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wis 13, githzerai
Benefit : The first time you hit a creature that has not yet acted during the encounter, that creature takes extra psychic damage equal to 1 + your Dexterity or Wisdom modifier. The extra damage increases to 2 + your Dexterity or Wisdom modifier at 11th level and 3 + your Dexterity or Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 182.

name: Zuwoth’s Enlightened Step
html:
Zuwoth’s Enlightened Step

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai
Benefit : During the first round of an encounter, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks from enemies that have not yet acted.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 184.

name: Githzerai Planewalker
html:
Githzerai Planewalker

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai
Benefit : When you perform the ritual Linked Portal, Planar Portal, or True Portal, you halve the time required to perform it and gain a +5 bonus to any required skill check. In addition, you can master those rituals even if you don’t have the Ritual Caster feat.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 188.

name: Iron Hands
html:
Iron Hands

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Wis 13, githzerai
Benefit : While your iron mind racial power is in effect, you gain a bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier to melee damage rolls.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 188.

name: Shared Danger Sense
html:
Shared Danger Sense

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai
Benefit : Allies within 5 squares of you gain a +2 racial bonus to initiative checks.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 189.

name: Wind’s Fortunes
html:
Wind’s Fortunes

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai
Benefit : When you use your Shifting Fortunes racial trait, you can instead teleport the number of squares you would have shifted.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 189.

name: Adamantine Mind
html:
Adamantine Mind

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, githzerai, iron mind racial power
Benefit : When you use your iron mind racial power, you gain a +4 bonus to all defenses, instead of +2.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Iron Body
html:
Iron Body

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Wis 13, githzerai, iron mind racial power
Benefit : While your iron mind racial power is in effect, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Peerless Reaction
html:
Peerless Reaction

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, githzerai
Benefit : When you are hit by an attack, you can expend the use of your iron mind as an immediate interrupt to use your second wind, instead of gaining iron mind’s normal effect.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Distant Reaping
html:
Distant Reaping

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant
Benefit : Creatures within 20 squares of you can trigger your dark reaping racial power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Double Reaping
html:
Double Reaping

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant
Benefit : When you deal the necrotic damage from your dark reaping racial power to a target, one enemy adjacent to that target takes the same amount of necrotic damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Fierce Vitality
html:
Fierce Vitality

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant
Benefit : If you drop to 0 or fewer hit points and choose to remain conscious due to Unnatural Vitality, you can remain conscious until you fail two death saving throws.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Reaper's Strike
html:
Reaper's Strike

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant
Benefit : When you use your dark reaping racial power, you also gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Spell Focus
html:
Spell Focus

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Cha 13, wizard
Benefit : Creatures that attempt saving throws against your wizard powers take a –2 penalty to the rolls.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 206.

name: Reaping Burst
html:
Reaping Burst

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Con 13, revenant
Benefit : When you use your dark reaping racial power, instead of its normal effect you can deal extra necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier to all targets you hit with a burst or blast power that you use before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Resilience of Death
html:
Resilience of Death

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant, Death’s Blessing feat
Benefit : You are immune to disease and you gain resist 10 poison. This increases to resist 15 poison at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Unnatural Stamina
html:
Unnatural Stamina

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant
Benefit : Increase your number of healing surges by one. When you spend a healing surge, you gain resist 10 cold, poison, and necrotic until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 42.

name: Ghostly Vitality
html:
Ghostly Vitality

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, revenant
Benefit : If you drop to 0 or fewer hit points and choose to remain conscious due to Unnatural Vitality, you can take a move action and a minor action in addition to the standard action Unnatural Vitality allows. While you have 0 or fewer hit points, you gain insubstantial.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 43.

name: Eerie Resurgence
html:
Eerie Resurgence

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, revenant
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to death saving throws. Whenever a result of your death saving throw is 20 or higher, you can spend an extra healing surge. You can also stand as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 43.

name: Reaping Renewal
html:
Reaping Renewal

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, revenant
Benefit : You can use dark reaping two times during each encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 43.

name: Reaping Synergy
html:
Reaping Synergy

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, revenant
Benefit : Whenever you use your dark reaping racial power, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls for powers that deal at least one of the damage types dealt by your dark reaping racial power. This bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 43.

name: Darren Gambler
html:
Darren Gambler

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tarmalune regional background
Benefit : When you reroll an attack roll, skill check, or ability check, you gain a +2 bonus to the roll. If the second result is less than the first, you grant combat advantage to all attackers until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Firequench Aspirant
html:
Firequench Aspirant

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tarmalune regional background
Benefit : You gain resist fire 2. At 11th level, this resistance improves to 5. At 21st level, this resistance improves to 8.

In addition, you master the ritual Arcane Mark (see the Forgotten Realms Player’s Guide) and can perform it without a ritual book.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Harglastan Catacomb Delver
html:
Harglastan Catacomb Delver

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Windrise Ports regional background
Benefit : When you take the squeeze action, you can move at full speed (instead of half speed) and have a -2 penalty to attack rolls (instead of -5). In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Dungeoneering skill checks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Imdolphyn Dockhaunt
html:
Imdolphyn Dockhaunt

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Windrise Ports regional background
Benefit : You gain a +2 bonus to Acrobatics checks made to balance and Athletics checks made to climb. In addition, you master the ritual Make Whole and can perform it without a ritual book.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Ramekho Troubleshooter
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Windrise Ports regional background
Benefit : When you successfully use the aid another action to aid a skill check or ability check made by an adjacent ally, you give a +3 bonus to your ally’s next check (instead of +2). In addition, choose one language. You can speak, read, and write that language fluently.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Sambrese Rake
html:
Sambrese Rake

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Windrise Ports regional background
Benefit : You gain a +3 bonus to Bluff checks made to gain combat advantage and can reroll each such check once. You must use the second result. Also, when you succeed on such a check, you can shift 1 square as part of the action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Tarn-Trader Bodyguard
html:
Tarn-Trader Bodyguard

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tarmalune regional background
Benefit : When an ally within 3 squares is reduced to 0 hit points or lower, gain 5 temporary hit points. At 11th level, you gain 10 temporary hit points. At 21st level, you gain 15 temporary hit points.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Vigilant Associate
html:
Vigilant Associate

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tarmalune regional background
Benefit : If you successfully intimidate an enemy with an Intimidate skill check, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn. You also gain proficiency and a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls with the short sword.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376 , page(s) 50.

name: Thin the Herd
html:

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, revenant
Benefit : Your dark reaping racial power is also triggered when a creature within 10 squares, including you, becomes bloodied.

name: Path of Destruction [Divinity]Path of Destruction (Channel Divinity)
html:
Path of Destruction [Divinity]

Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship a deity of the destruction domain
Benefit : You gain the Channel Divinity power path of destruction.


Feat Utility Path of Destruction (Channel Divinity)

A snarled prayer is enough to invoke the power of the Breaker, the Mangler, the Destroyer—your god.

Encounter Divine
Free Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : You roll damage for a melee attack

Effect : You reroll the damage and use either result.


Published in Divine Power , page(s) 111.

name: Enlarge Familiar [Familiar]Enlarge Familiar
html:
Enlarge Familiar [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Artificer, Arcane Familiar feat, 16th-level or higher utility power
Benefit : The enlarge familiar power replaces one of your 16th-level or higher utility powers.


Feat Utility Enlarge Familiar

Suddenly, what had seemed a harmless pet rears up to threaten your enemy.

Encounter Arcane , Teleportation
Minor Action Personal

Requirement : Your familiar must be in its active state.

Effect : Until the start of your next turn, your familiar becomes a Small creature with hit points equal to your healing surge value and can flank enemies. It cannot otherwise make attacks. When this effect ends, your familiar teleports into your space and enters passive mode.


Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Free-Ranging Familiar [Familiar]
html:
Free-Ranging Familiar [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, artificer, Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : While in active mode, your familiar can exist up to 20 squares farther from you than normal.

Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Infused Familiar [Familiar]Infused Familiar
html:
Infused Familiar [Familiar]

Prerequisite : Artificer, Arcane Familiar feat, 10th-level or higher utility power
Benefit : The infused familiar power replaces one of your 10th-level or higher utility powers.


Feat Utility Infused Familiar

You infuse your familiar with arcane energy, granting it the ability to render emergency aid.

Encounter Arcane
Minor Action Personal

Requirement : It is your turn and your familiar must be in its active state.

Effect : You use healing infusion, but your familiar is the origin square for the effect.


Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Toughness
html:
Toughness

Benefit : You gain 5 additional hit points. These additional hit points increase to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 318, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 320.

name: Vigorous Familiar [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, artificer, Arcane Familiar feat, Mark of Handling feat or member of House Vadalis
Benefit : Your knowledge of House Vadalis’s beast breeding techniques allows you to form your familiar with greater speed and resilience. Your familiar gains a +2 feat bonus to speed and a +1 feat bonus to AC.

Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Shardbound Familiar (Eberron) [Familiar]Dragonshard Shield
html:
Shardbound Familiar (Eberron) [Familiar]

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : Arcane Familiar feat, 10th-level or higher utility power
Benefit : The dragonshard shield power replaces one of your 10th-level or higher utility powers.


Feat Utility Dragonshard Shield

The embrace of the Dragon Between protects you both in time of need.

Encounter Arcane
Immediate Interrupt Personal

Requirement : Your familiar must be in its active state.

Trigger : An enemy adjacent to your familiar hits you or your familiar

Target : You and your familiar

Effect : Reduce the damage the triggering enemy does to you by 10, and your familiar takes no damage from the attack. After the attack is resolved, you and your familiar shift your speed and have phasing during this move.


Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Shardbound Familiar (Khyber) [Familiar]
html:
Shardbound Familiar (Khyber) [Familiar]

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : Whenever you bloody an enemy adjacent to your active familiar with an arcane power, that enemy also takes ongoing 10 acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, or thunder damage (save ends).

Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Shardbound Familiar (Siberys) [Familiar]Siberys Unleashed
html:
Shardbound Familiar (Siberys) [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Arcane Familiar feat, 16th-level or higher utility power
Benefit : The Siberys unleashed power replaces one of your 16th-level or higher utility powers.


Feat Utility Siberys Unleashed

The glory of the Dragon Above shines through your familiar in time of need.

Daily Arcane , Conjuration
Standard Action Area wall 8 within 20

Requirement : Your familiar must be in its active state.

Effect : Your familiar is destroyed. You conjure a wall of chill wind and brilliant light up to 4 squares high that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall’s origin square is the square the familiar occupied. The wall costs 2 additional squares to enter, and enemies take a –2 penalty to attack rolls against targets inside or on the other side of the wall.
When an enemy starts its turn adjacent to or in the wall, you can slide that enemy up to 3 squares to a square also in or adjacent to the wall and the enemy is slowed until the
end of its turn.

Sustain Minor : The effect persists.


Published in Dragon Magazine 377 , page(s) 35.

name: Courageous Example

At 21st level, the ally deals an extra 10 radiant damage.

Changed in Jan/Feb 2012 updates.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 207.

name: Small Warrior's Defense

html:

name: Swift Spear

html:

name: Dragon's Rebuke [Multiclass]Dragon's Rebuke
html:
Dragon's Rebuke [Multiclass]

Prerequisite : 4th level, Platinum Revelation
Benefit : You can swap one 3rd-level or higher encounter attack power you know for the dragon’s rebuke attack power.


Feat Attack Dragon's Rebuke

Your strike awakens the dragon within you, giving you the drive to punish you foe should it fail to give your god his proper due.

Encounter Divine , Weapon
Standard Action Melee weapon

Target : One creature

Attack : Your highest ability vs. AC

Hit : 2[W] + your highest ability modifier damage. If the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target before the start of your next turn, you can push the target 2 squares as an immediate reaction.

Level 13 Swap: Hit : 3[W] + your highest ability modifier damage.

Level 23 Swap: Hit : 4[W] + your highest ability modifier damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Hand of Justice [Multiclass]Hand of Justice
html:
Hand of Justice [Multiclass]

Prerequisite : 4th level, Noble Indoctrination
Benefit : You can swap one 3rd-level or higher encounter attack power you know for the hand of justice attack power.


Feat Attack Hand of Justice

A radiant draconic claw appears and punishes your enemy for attacking a friend.

Encounter Divine , Implement
Immediate Reaction Ranged 10

Trigger : An enemy within range that you can see hits an ally with an attack

Target : The triggering enemy

Attack : Your highest ability vs. Fortitude

Hit : 1d12 + your highest ability modifier damage, and the ally the triggering attack hit can spend a healing surge.

Level 13 Swap : 2d12 + your highest ability modifier damage.

Level 23 Swap : 3d12 + your highest ability modifier damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Noble Indoctrination [Multiclass Bahamut]Righteous Judgment
html:
Noble Indoctrination [Multiclass Bahamut]

Prerequisite : Wis 13, you must worship Bahamut
Benefit : You gain training in Religion. You gain the righteous judgment power. You can use any implement you can normally use as an implement for the powers from this multiclass feat and those that list it as a prerequisite. You can also use any weapon you are proficient with as an implement for these powers, but the weapon’s proficiency bonus doesn’t apply.


Feat Attack Righteous Judgment

You whisper a bitter prayer, condemning your enemy to Bahamut’s judgment.

Encounter Divine , Implement , Radiant
Standard Action Ranged 5

Target : One creature

Attack : Your highest ability vs. Will

Hit : If the target moves before the end of your next turn, one ally within 5 squares of you may shift as an immediate reaction. If the target makes an attack before the end of your next turn, one ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Platinum Revelation [Multiclass Bahamut]Bahamut's Shield
html:
Platinum Revelation [Multiclass Bahamut]

Prerequisite : Str 13, you must worship Bahamut
Benefit : You gain training in Insight. You gain the Bahamut’s shield power.


Feat Attack Bahamut's Shield

You invoke the Platinum Dragon to shield yourself and others from harm.

Encounter Divine , Weapon
Standard Action Melee weapon

Target : One creature

Attack : Your highest ability vs. AC

Hit : 1[W] + your highest ability modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to its next attack roll before the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Righteous Intolerance [Multiclass]Righteous Intolerance

Righteous Intolerance [Multiclass]

Prerequisite : 10th level, Platinum Revelation
Benefit : You can swap one 9th-level or higher daily attack power you know for the righteous intolerance attack power.

Filled with righteous fury, you unleash divine wrath to penetrate your opponent’s defenses.

Daily Divine , Radiant , Weapon
Standard Action Melee weapon

Target : One creature

Attack : Your highest ability vs. AC

Hit : 2[W] + your highest ability modifier radiant damage.

Effect : The enemy radiates Bahamut’s righteous fury (save ends). While the target radiates righteous fury, when an ally within 3 squares of the target takes damage from an attack, that ally gains temporary hit points equal to your highest ability modifier and you can shift up to your speed to a square adjacent to that ally.

Aftereffect : The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Level 19 Swap: Hit : 4[W] + your highest ability modifier radiant damage.

Level 29 Swap: Hit : 6[W] + your highest ability modifier damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Righteous Savior [Multiclass]Righteous Savior

Immediate Interrupt Ranged 5

Trigger : An ally in range is hit by an attack

Target : The triggering ally

Effect : Shift up to 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target. The target gains a +3 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Benefit : You can swap one 9th-level or higher daily attack power you know for the shining purpose attack power.

As you shrug off your injuries, your vision reveals a path to certain victory.

Free Action Close burst 3

Trigger : You hit an enemy

Target : One ally you can see in the burst

Level 29 Swap: Effect : Extra 3d10 radiant damage.

Daily Divine , Healing
Immediate Reaction Ranged 10

Trigger : An ally within range is hit by an attack

Effect : The ally regains hit points as if it spent a healing surge, and you can teleport 10 squares to a square adjacent to the enemy that attacked the ally and mark that enemy (save ends).

name: Fortune's Predator
html:
Fortune's Predator

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, druid, Primal Predator class feature
Benefit : When you use wild shape to change from your beast form to your humanoid form, you can shift 2 squares instead of 1.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Githzerai Beast Mastery
html:
Githzerai Beast Mastery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains a +2 bonus to saving throws against the dazed, dominated, and stunned conditions. When you use your second wind, your beast companion can shift 3 squares as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Githzerai Blade Master
html:
Githzerai Blade Master

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai
Benefit : You gain proficiency with all military heavy blades, as well as the bastard sword and the fullblade. Additionally, you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with these weapons. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Marked Fortunes
html:
Marked Fortunes

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, defender role
Benefit : When you use Shifting Fortunes to shift, you can mark each enemy adjacent to you at the end of your shift.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Iron Retreat
html:
Iron Retreat

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, iron mind racial power, controller role
Benefit : When you use iron mind, you can shift 2 squares after the action that triggered it is resolved and, until the end of your next turn, you can shift 1 square as a free action each time an enemy hits you with an attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Iron Riposte
html:
Iron Riposte

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, iron mind racial power, rogue
Benefit : When you use iron mind, you gain combat advantage against the triggering attacker until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Marked With Iron
html:
Marked With Iron

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, iron mind racial power, Wis 13, defender role
Benefit : When you use iron mind, targets marked by you take an additional penalty to attack rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier for any attack that doesn’t include you as a target. This penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Shifting Spirit
html:
Shifting Spirit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Githzerai, shaman
Benefit : Whenever you shift, your spirit companion can shift the same number of squares.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Energy Transference
html:
Energy Transference

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai, iron mind racial power
Benefit : When you use iron mind, you gain resist 5 against any damage types dealt by the triggering attack until the end of your next turn. At 21st level, this resistance increases to 10.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Githzerai Healer
html:
Githzerai Healer

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai
Benefit : Whenever you use a healing power, each target of that power can make a saving throw with a +2 bonus against an effect that includes dazed, dominated, or stunned.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Weapon Proficiency
html:
Weapon Proficiency

Benefit : You gain proficiency in a single weapon of your choice.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another weapon.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 319, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 321.

name: Githzerai Mobility
html:
Githzerai Mobility

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Wis 13, githzerai
Benefit : You gain a bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Tempered Iron Mind
html:
Tempered Iron Mind

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai
Benefit : Your iron mind racial power is a free action and can be triggered even if an attack misses you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Zuoken's Centering
html:
Zuoken's Centering

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, githzerai, Wis 15, monk
Benefit : Your hit points and number of healing surges are based on your Wisdom instead of Constitution. When you must make a Strength check, you can use Wisdom instead, and your Athletics checks are based on your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Energy Transmutation
html:
Energy Transmutation

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, githzerai, iron mind racial power
Benefit : When you use iron mind triggered by an attack that has a damage type keyword, you can choose cold, fire, lightning, psychic, radiant, or thunder. Until the end of your next turn, any attack you make can deal damage of the chosen type in place of any other damage type.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Ironclad Oath
html:
Ironclad Oath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, githzerai, avenger, iron mind racial power
Benefit : When you use iron mind, you gain combat advantage and a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier against your oath of enmity target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378 .

name: Assassin's Cloak
html:
Assassin's Cloak

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : Whenever you become invisible, you can make a Stealth check to hide as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Assassin's Escape
html:
Assassin's Escape

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, shade form power
Benefit : You can use your shade form as an immediate interrupt when you take damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Avernian Emissary Wrath
html:
Avernian Emissary Wrath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : Once per encounter, when you miss your assassin’s shroud target, you can use your infernal wrath racial power against it, even if you have already used infernal wrath during this encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Blood Devourer Shifting
html:
Blood Devourer Shifting

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Shifter, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, choose an enemy that has at least one of your shrouds on it. The next time you attack that enemy before the end of your next turn, you deal damage to that enemy equal to your Dexterity modifier, in addition to the attack’s other effects.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Brutal Shroud
html:
Brutal Shroud

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : Whenever you make the damage roll for your assassin’s shroud, reroll each die that shows a 1 until it shows a different number.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Crimson Eye Action
html:
Crimson Eye Action

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you spend an action point, you also subject your assassin’s shroud target to an additional shroud.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Dawn Hunter Training
html:
Dawn Hunter Training

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, assassin
Benefit : You can use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll a damage roll instead of an attack roll. You must reroll all the dice. Use the higher of the two results.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Emerald Scale Concealment
html:
Emerald Scale Concealment

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, assassin
Benefit : You become invisible to a creature hit by your dragon breath racial power until the end of your turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Eternal Void Memories
html:
Eternal Void Memories

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Deva, assassin
Benefit : When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to improve an attack roll, the target of that attack roll takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, in addition to the attack’s other effects.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Grave Dust Advantage
html:
Grave Dust Advantage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, revenant, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you use your dark reaping racial power, you subject your assassin’s shroud target to another shroud.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Grave Dust Assassin
html:
Grave Dust Assassin

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, revenant, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you deal damage with your dark reaping racial power, if the target has at least one of your shrouds on it, it takes damage as if you had invoked your shrouds.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Hidden Insight
html:
Hidden Insight

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : Creatures from which you are hidden are not aware of your shrouds.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Hungry Sky Shadows
html:
Hungry Sky Shadows

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Goliath, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you both invoke your shrouds on an enemy and hit it, the enemy takes extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Killer's Insight
html:
Killer's Insight

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : Once per encounter when you use assassin’s shroud, you can subject the target to two shrouds instead of one.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Mist Walker Illusion
html:
Mist Walker Illusion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Gnome, assassin
Benefit : When you hit with a shadow power, you can use your fade away racial power as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Armor Specialization (Chainmail)
html:
Armor Specialization (Chainmail)

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Dex 15, training with chainmail
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to AC while wearing chainmail. You reduce the check penalty incurred by chainmail by 1.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Nightmare Killer
html:
Nightmare Killer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with fear powers. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 26.

name: Nightmare Step
html:
Nightmare Step

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : When you miss a creature with a fear power, you can slide the creature 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Obsidian Cave Recovery
html:
Obsidian Cave Recovery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf, assassin, shade form power
Benefit : When you use your second wind as a minor action, you regain the use of your shade form if you have already used it during this encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Phantom Blade Evasion
html:
Phantom Blade Evasion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, assassin, shadow step power
Benefit : When you use your second chance racial power, you can use shadow step as a free action when the attack is resolved.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Scions of Zarak Initiate
html:
Scions of Zarak Initiate

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-orc, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you miss a target but your shrouds still deals damage to it, you can expend your furious assault racial power to deal 1d6 extra damage to the target. The damage increases to 1d12 at 11th level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Shadow Veil Assassin
html:
Shadow Veil Assassin

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : When you hit an adjacent creature with an illusion power that is an encounter or a daily attack power, you can shift 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Shadow Veil Disappearance
html:
Shadow Veil Disappearance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : When you hit a creature with a melee power that has the illusion keyword, you can make a Stealth check to hide from that creature if you end a move action with cover or concealment against it before the end of your current turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Twilight Phantom Step
html:
Twilight Phantom Step

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : You can increase the distance of your fey step racial power by 5 squares if your destination space is adjacent to your assassin’s shroud target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Velvet Blade Trick
html:
Velvet Blade Trick

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : Once per encounter, when you use the power granted by your Dilettante racial trait, you subject the target of your assassin’s shroud power to another shroud.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Venom Hand Assassin
html:
Venom Hand Assassin

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : After a short or an extended rest, pick a weapon you’re carrying. The next attack made with that weapon before your next short or extended rest deals 1d8 extra poison damage on a hit. On a miss, the extra damage is lost. The damage increases to 2d8 at 11th level and 3d8 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Armor Specialization (Plate)
html:
Armor Specialization (Plate)

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Con 15, training with plate armor
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to AC when wearing plate armor.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Venom Hand Killer
html:
Venom Hand Killer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to poison damage rolls. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Venom Hand Master
html:
Venom Hand Master

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin
Benefit : Your attacks ignore poison resistance and poison immunity.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Venom Handler
html:
Venom Handler

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Assassin, Venom Hand Assassin feat
Benefit : You gain resist 5 poison. The resistance increases to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Minion of the Dark
html:
Minion of the Dark

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, assassin
Benefit : You gain darkvision.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Nightmare Master
html:
Nightmare Master

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, assassin
Benefit : When you hit a creature with a fear power, the creature is dazed until the start of its next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Shadow Initiate [Multiclass Assassin]
html:
Shadow Initiate [Multiclass Assassin]

Prerequisite : Dex 13
Benefit : You gain training in the Stealth skill. Twice per encounter, you can use the assassin’s shroud power. In addition, you can wield ki focuses.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31, Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 27.

name: Bloodied Elusion
html:
Bloodied Elusion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Seeker, Bloodbond class feature
Benefit : When you are bloodied by any attack, you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 177.

name: Inescapable Shot
html:
Inescapable Shot

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Seeker, inevitable shot power
Benefit : When you use your inevitable shot, you can make the ranged basic attack against an enemy within 10 squares of the creature you missed, instead of an enemy within 5 squares.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 181.

name: Strengthened Bond
html:
Strengthened Bond

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Seeker, Seeker’s Bond class feature
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you regain the use of your Seeker’s Bond power if it is expended.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 183.

name: Bloodbond Wrath
html:
Bloodbond Wrath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, seeker, encaging spirits power
Benefit : The targets of your encaging spirits grant combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 185.

name: Armor Specialization (Scale)
html:
Armor Specialization (Scale)

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Dex 15, training with scale armor
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to AC when wearing scale armor. You ignore the speed penalty normally incurred by scale armor.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Inevitable Volley
html:
Inevitable Volley

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, seeker, inevitable shot power
Benefit : When you use your inevitable shot, you can make two ranged basic attacks instead of one, each against a different target.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 188.

name: Inevitable Accuracy
html:
Inevitable Accuracy

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, seeker, inevitable shot power
Benefit : When you use your inevitable shot and don’t hit with it, you regain the use of the power.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Agile Form
html:
Agile Form

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : When you use wild shape to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you shift 1 square.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Animal Empathy
html:
Animal Empathy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Trained in Nature
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks. Also, when you would make an Insight check against a natural beast, you can make a Nature check instead.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Bloody Triumph
html:
Bloody Triumph

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian, Thaneborn Triumph class feature
Benefit : When you bloody an enemy, you or an ally gains a bonus to the next damage roll against that enemy before the end of the encounter equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Crippling Crush
html:
Crippling Crush

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden
Benefit : When you immobilize or slow an enemy with a weapon attack using a hammer or a mace, that enemy takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Deep Sage
html:
Deep Sage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Trained in Dungeoneering
Benefit : You gain a +5 feat bonus to Dungeoneering knowledge checks and to monster knowledge checks to identify aberrant creatures.
In addition, you can now speak, read, and write Deep Speech fluently.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Druid of Darkness
html:
Druid of Darkness

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against enemies granting combat advantage to you.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Earthstrength Resilience
html:
Earthstrength Resilience

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden, Earthstrength class feature
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you gain resist 2 to all damage until the end of your next turn. The resistance increases to 5 at 11th level and 8 at 21st level.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Elemental Barbarian
html:
Elemental Barbarian

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, barbarian
Benefit : When you use your firepulse or promise of storm racial power while raging, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 136.

name: Eyes of the Spirits
html:
Eyes of the Spirits

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, any primal class
Benefit : Each ally affected by your Group Awareness racial trait doesn’t take the –2 penalty for attacking an enemy that has concealment.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Fading Spirit
html:
Fading Spirit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Gnome, shaman
Benefit : While you are hidden from a creature, your spirit companion is also hidden from that creature.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Fearsome Charge
html:
Fearsome Charge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian, Rageblood Vigor class feature
Benefit : When you hit with the charge attack granted by swift charge, you can push the target 1 square.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Feral Fey Step
html:
Feral Fey Step

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin, any primal class
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you can use your fey step racial power as an immediate reaction, even if you have already used it during this encounter.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Focus the Spirits' Lives
html:
Focus the Spirits' Lives

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Deva, any primal class
Benefit : When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to make a Nature check or an attack roll using a beast form or a spirit power, you add 1d10 to the roll, rather than 1d6.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Half-Elf Spirit Speaker
html:
Half-Elf Spirit Speaker

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, any primal class
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you and each ally within 10 squares of you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
In addition, allies within 10 squares of you gain a +1 racial bonus to Insight checks and Nature checks.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Herbalist
html:
Herbalist

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Trained in Dungeoneering or Nature, trained in Heal
Benefit : You gain a +5 bonus to Heal checks to treat disease.
In addition, when you reach 5th level, you master the ritual Brew Potion and can perform it without a ritual book.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Hide Armor Expertise
html:
Hide Armor Expertise

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 15, any primal class, proficiency with hide armor
Benefit : While wearing hide armor, you can gain a +2 bonus to AC instead of using your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier to determine your AC.


Update (2/8/2010)
Replace the feat’s Benefit entry with the following text: “While wearing hide armor, you can gain a +2 bonus to AC instead of using your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier to determine your AC.”

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 137.

name: Axe Mastery
html:
Axe Mastery

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Str 21, Con 17
Benefit : When you make a melee weapon attack with an axe, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 206.

name: Human Nature Lore
html:
Human Nature Lore

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, any primal class
Benefit : Whenever you make an Endurance check or a Nature check, you can roll twice and use either result.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Hurl Weapon
html:
Hurl Weapon

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : You can use any one-handed off-hand weapon as a heavy thrown weapon. Normal range for weapons you wield this way is 5 squares, and long range is 10 squares.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Impaling Thrust
html:
Impaling Thrust

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden
Benefit : Whenever you score a critical hit with a heavy blade or a spear, you can choose to treat the critical hit as a normal hit. If you do so, the target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Improvised Missile
html:
Improvised Missile

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : You can use improvised melee weapons (not including unarmed attacks) as heavy thrown weapons with a normal range of 5 squares and a long range of 10 squares.
In addition, whenever you use an improvised melee weapon this way, you gain a +2 feat bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Inner Compass
html:
Inner Compass

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Trained in Dungeoneering or Nature
Benefit : You always know which way is north. When making a Dungeoneering check or a Nature check to find your way in a natural environment, you can roll twice and use either result.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Invigorating Spirit
html:
Invigorating Spirit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Shaman, healing spirit power
Benefit : When you use healing spirit, each ally adjacent to your spirit companion can shift 1 square as a free action.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Lifespirit Vigor
html:
Lifespirit Vigor

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden, Lifespirit class feature
Benefit : You can grant a saving throw to a second ally within 5 squares of you when you use your second wind.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Longtooth Spirit Shifter
html:
Longtooth Spirit Shifter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Longtooth shifter, any primal class
Benefit : While you are under the effect of your longtooth shifting racial power, the regeneration you gain increases by 2.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Manifest Healing
html:
Manifest Healing

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, any primal class
Benefit : When you use a genasi racial power, you gain 5 temporary hit points. The temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level. If you have two or more elemental manifestations, the temporary hit points increase by 5.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Markings of the Elements
html:
Markings of the Elements

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Goliath, any primal class
Benefit : Whenever you use your stone’s endurance racial power, you can choose cold, fire, lightning, poison, radiant, or thunder. If you do so, you gain resistance to that damage type instead of resistance to all damage, and the resistance increases by 5.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Backstabber
html:
Backstabber

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, Sneak Attack class feature
Benefit : The extra damage dice from your Sneak Attack class feature increase from d6s to d8s.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 194.

name: Markings of the Predator
html:
Markings of the Predator

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Goliath, any primal class
Benefit : When you bloody a creature, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Precise Fangs
html:
Precise Fangs

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Shaman, Stalker Spirit class feature
Benefit : When you use your spirit’s fangs power, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Predator's Burst
html:
Predator's Burst

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, Primal Predator class feature, wild shape power
Benefit : When you charge while you are in beast form, you gain a +2 bonus to speed and a +1 bonus to the damage rolls of the charge attack.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Primal Breath
html:
Primal Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, warden
Benefit : When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to mark each target. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.


Update (6/14/2010)
At the end of the Benefit line, add “The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.”

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 140.

name: Primal Halfling Counterattack
html:
Primal Halfling Counterattack

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, any primal class
Benefit : When you use your second chance racial power, you gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls against the creature that attacked you until the end of your next turn. This bonus increases to +6 at 11th level and +8 at 21st level.

However, you gain no benefit from a handheld item, such as a shield, that must be wielded to be functional, and you can use only the properties and powers of the item that don’t require you to make an attack with it.

name: Raging Bloodcut

Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : When you hit a target with any rage power, you have the option of reducing the damage to that target by 1[W] before you roll damage. If you do so, the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
At 11th level, you gain the option of reducing the damage by 2[W] to increase the ongoing damage to 10. At 21st level, you gain the option of reducing the damage by 3[W] to increase the ongoing damage to 15. You can’t take away more damage dice than the power has. For example, if a power normally deals 2[W] damage, you can’t reduce the damage by 3[W].
