name: Dragonborn Senses
html:
Dragonborn Senses

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn
Benefit : You gain low-light vision.
You also gain a +1 feat bonus on Perception checks.


Addition (7/28/2008)
Add word "also" before gain in 2nd sentence of Benefits line.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 194.

name: Warden's Endurance [Multiclass Warden]
html:
Warden's Endurance [Multiclass Warden]

Prerequisite : Defender of the Wild feat
Benefit : Once per encounter, you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end at the start of your turn. On a save, the effect immediately ends, preventing it from affecting you on your current turn. If you fail the saving throw, you still make a saving throw against the effect at the end of your turn.

Published in Primal Power , page(s) 148.

name: Cast Iron Font
html:
Cast Iron Font

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf, warden, Font of Life class feature
Benefit : When you save against a poison effect at the start of your turn, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 44.

name: Courage of the Lone Stag
html:
Courage of the Lone Stag

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden, Nature’s Wrath class feature
Benefit : When you mark three or more enemies with Nature’s Wrath, you gain a +2 bonus to weapon damage rolls against creatures you mark until the start of your next turn. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 44.

name: Crushing Guardian
html:
Crushing Guardian

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden
Benefit : You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with hammer or mace weapon attacks while in guardian form. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 44.

name: Deft Guardian
html:
Deft Guardian

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden
Benefit : You can shift 1 square as a free action when you assume a guardian form.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Dilettante's Mark
html:
Dilettante's Mark

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, warden
Benefit : When you hit an enemy with your dilettante power, you mark that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Dragonborn Vengeance
html:
Dragonborn Vengeance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, warden
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to your dragon breath attack rolls when attacking creatures marked by you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Elemental Might
html:
Elemental Might

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, warden
Benefit : When you use the encounter power associated with your racial manifestation, until the end of your next turn you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against creatures marked by you. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Elven Guardian
html:
Elven Guardian

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, warden
Benefit : When you use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll a weapon attack while in guardian form, you gain a +2 feat bonus to the rerolled attack roll.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Guard of Stone
html:
Guard of Stone

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Goliath, warden
Benefit : While you are under the effect of your stone’s endurance racial power, each enemy marked by you takes an additional penalty to attack rolls for attacks that don’t include you as a target. The penalty equals your Constitution modifier and lasts until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Half-Orc Vengeance
html:
Half-Orc Vengeance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-orc, warden
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain a +2 feat bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against creatures marked by you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Longtooth Vengeance
html:
Longtooth Vengeance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Longtooth shifter, warden
Benefit : The bonus to damage rolls granted by your longtooth shifting racial power increases to +3 against targets that are marked by you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Razorclaw Swiftness
html:
Razorclaw Swiftness

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Razorclaw shifter, warden
Benefit : While you are using your razorclaw shifting racial power, you can shift 1 square before or after using Nature’s Wrath.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Wrath of the Forester
html:
Wrath of the Forester

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, warden, Nature’s Wrath class feature
Benefit : When you spend an action point to take an extra action, if you have already used your Nature’s Wrath class feature during this turn, you can use it a second time before the end of your turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Earth's Punishment
html:
Earth's Punishment

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warden, Earthstrength class feature
Benefit : When an adjacent enemy that is marked by you makes an attack that does not include you as a target, and hits and damages at least one of your allies, it takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 45.

name: Font of Vengeance
html:
Font of Vengeance

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warden, Font of Life class feature
Benefit : When you save against ongoing damage at the start of your turn, if you are adjacent to and can make an opportunity attack against the creature that inflicted the ongoing damage, you deal damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 46.

name: Quickening Font
html:
Quickening Font

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warden, Font of Life class feature
Benefit : When you save against an effect at the start of your turn, your speed increases by 1 until the end of your turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 46.

name: Vengeful Grasp
html:
Vengeful Grasp

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warden, warden’s grasp power
Benefit : When you make a warden’s grasp attack, you can choose to push the target 3 squares rather than slide it 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 46.

name: Dazing Fury
html:
Dazing Fury

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, warden, warden’s fury power
Benefit : When you hit with warden’s fury, instead of granting combat advantage, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 46.

name: Limitless Wrath
html:
Limitless Wrath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, warden, Nature’s Wrath class feature
Benefit : When an enemy marked by you drops to 0 hit points, you can use Nature’s Wrath as a free action, even if you have already used it this turn and even if it is not during your turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 46.

name: Dwarven Durability
html:
Dwarven Durability

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Dwarf
Benefit : Increase your number of healing surges by two and your healing surge value by your Constitution modifier.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Battle Cleric Armaments
html:
Battle Cleric Armaments

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Str 15, cleric
Benefit : You gain proficiency with light shields and with one military weapon of your choice.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 55.

name: Domain Synergy
html:
Domain Synergy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric, domain feat and the domain’s divinity feat
Benefit : When you use the Channel Divinity power of a domain for which you have the domain feat, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with that domain’s associated at-will powers until the end of the encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 55.

name: Greater Divine Fortune
html:
Greater Divine Fortune

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric, divine fortune power
Benefit : The bonus granted by divine fortune increases to +3.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 55.

name: Harbinger of Rebirth
html:
Harbinger of Rebirth

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric
Benefit : You gain a +2 bonus to Heal checks. In addition, any ally within 5 squares of you gains a +5 feat bonus to death saving throws.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 55.

name: Pacifist's Reward
html:
Pacifist's Reward

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric
Benefit : When you hit with an attack that doesn’t deal damage, if you didn’t deal any damage on your turn, gain 2 temporary hit points at the end of the turn.
The temporary hit points increase to 3 at 11th level, and to 4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 55.

name: Word of Retaliation
html:
Word of Retaliation

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric, healing word power
Benefit : When you use healing word, the target regains extra hit points equal to the number of enemies adjacent to him or her.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 56.

name: Assured Healing
html:
Assured Healing

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, cleric
Benefit : When you miss with a divine attack power with the healing keyword, and that power has no effect on a miss, you or one ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 56.

name: Gambler's Word
html:
Gambler's Word

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, cleric, healing word power
Benefit : Once per encounter, when you score a critical hit, you gain an additional use of your healing word power during this encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 56.

name: Brutal Tactics
html:
Brutal Tactics

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : While you flank an enemy and wield a two-handed weapon, the ally with whom you flank the enemy can reroll any damage die that displays a 1 when making a melee attack against the flanked enemy. The ally can reroll each die once.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Fighter Weapon Specialization
html:
Fighter Weapon Specialization

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls when you hit with an attack using a weapon of the style you chose for the Fighter Weapon Talent class feature.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Forceful Opportunist
html:
Forceful Opportunist

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : Whenever you hit a target with an opportunity attack, you can push the target 1 square and shift into the square the target vacated.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Hewing Charge
html:
Hewing Charge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : You gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier when making charge attacks while using a two-handed weapon.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Scrappy
html:
Scrappy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Small size
Benefit : When wielding a one-handed versatile weapon in two hands, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Mastered Technique
html:
Mastered Technique

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to AC when you hit with an attack using a weapon of the style you chose for the Fighter Weapon Talent class feature until the end of your next turn.


Revision (11/5/2009)
Page 62. Added “until the end of your next turn” to Mastered Technique.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Pinning Challenge
html:
Pinning Challenge

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : Whenever you hit a target already marked by you with a two-handed weapon and when using a basic attack, the target is also immobilized until the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Steely Defense
html:
Steely Defense

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : When you take the total defense action while wielding a two-handed weapon, any enemy that attacks you with a melee attack takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 62.

name: Inevitable Challenge
html:
Inevitable Challenge

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : Whenever you miss with a melee basic attack from your Combat Challenge class feature, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 63.

name: True Reliability
html:
True Reliability

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, fighter, Fighter Weapon Talent class feature
Benefit : When you miss with a melee attack for a fighter power with the reliable keyword, your next attack using the same power gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll if you use it before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 63.

name: Airspur Windrider
html:
Airspur Windrider

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Akanûl regional background
Benefit : You subtract 10 feet from the total distance fallen before determining damage after a fall.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 69.

name: Chondalwood Mystic
html:
Chondalwood Mystic

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Akanûl regional background
Benefit : You possess Spellplague sense. You know when you’re within 5 squares of something touched by the Spellplague (an area of Spellplague, a plaguechanged creature, or a creature with a spellscar). You can sense the presence of the source, but not the direction or distance.
You also gain a +2 feat bonus on Nature checks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 69.

name: Hammergate Conniver
html:
Hammergate Conniver

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : East Rift regional background
Benefit : When you succeed on a Bluff check, gain a +3 bonus to your next Diplomacy or Intimidate check in the encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 71.

name: Underwatch Vigilant
html:
Underwatch Vigilant

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : East Rift regional background
Benefit : You may reroll any monster knowledge check made to identify or gain information on a creature of the aberrant origin, keeping the second result.
You also gain a +2 feat bonus on Insight checks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 71.

name: Ruinspoke Scrounger
html:
Ruinspoke Scrounger

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tymanther regional background
Benefit : Once per day, when you miss on an attack roll with an alchemical item, roll a d20. On a result of 10 or higher, that item is not expended and can be retrieved at the end of the encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 72.

name: Thymaran Engineer
html:
Thymaran Engineer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tymanther regional background
Benefit : You may reroll any skill check made as a countermeasure to a trap, keeping the second result.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379 , page(s) 72.

name: Pointed Step Style
html:
Pointed Step Style

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Monk, Flurry of Blows class feature
Benefit : When your flurry of blows power is triggered by an attack that you make with a spear, one target of that power can be up to 2 squares away from you.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 182.

name: Empty Mind
html:
Empty Mind

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, voidsoul elemental manifestation
Benefit : When an enemy hits you with an attack that targets your Will or deals psychic damage to you, that enemy takes psychic damage equal to your psychic resistance.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 20.

name: Eyes of Dying Light
html:
Eyes of Dying Light

Prerequisite : Genasi, cindersoul elemental manifestation
Benefit : You gain darkvision. When using your darkvision, a light as of a dying spark shines in your eyes.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 21.

name: Sense of the Corrupted
html:
Sense of the Corrupted

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, any corrupt manifestation
Benefit : You gain a +5 bonus to Perception checks to detect demons and a +5 bonus to Insight checks to see through demons’ disguises.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 21.

name: Foul Torrent
html:
Foul Torrent

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, genasi, causticsoul elemental manifestation, acid surge racial power
Benefit : As part of your acid surge racial power, you can shift your speed instead of half your speed.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 21.

name: Blood Cousin's Tribe [Tribal]
html:
Blood Cousin's Tribe [Tribal]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls when raging. This bonus increases by 1 for each ally within 10 squares of you who has at least one tribal feat.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 35.

name: Whisper's Advice
html:
Whisper's Advice

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : When an enemy that is adjacent to you recharges a power at the start of its turn, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against that enemy until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 35.

name: Angry Grandfather
html:
Angry Grandfather

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : You gain a bonus to death saving throws equal to the number of rages you have expended since your last extended rest.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 35.

name: Bitter Cold
html:
Bitter Cold

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wizard
Benefit : When you hit a creature with a cold wizard power, that creature also takes a -2 penalty to its Fortitude until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Far Spell
html:
Far Spell

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wizard
Benefit : If a wizard power has a range of 10 squares or fewer, increase the power’s normal range by 2 squares. If a wizard power has a range of 11–20 squares, increase the power’s normal range by 5 squares. This also applies to area powers, so an area burst 1 within 10 becomes an area burst 1 within 12.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Illusionary Stealth
html:
Illusionary Stealth

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wizard, trained in Stealth
Benefit : Whenever you use a wizard illusion power and you hit a target, you gain a feat bonus to Stealth checks equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Immolate the Masses
html:
Immolate the Masses

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wizard
Benefit : When you use a wizard power, you gain 1 temporary hit point for each minion you reduce to 0 hit points with that power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Acid Splash
html:
Acid Splash

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Con 13, wizard
Benefit : When you miss with an acid wizard power and would not normally do damage, you deal acid damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Energy Recovery
html:
Energy Recovery

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Wis 13, wizard
Benefit : Whenever a creature fails a saving throw gainst an effect from one of your wizard powers, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Blood Thirst
html:
Blood Thirst

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level
Benefit : You gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls against bloodied foes.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Evasion
html:
Evasion

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Dex 15
Benefit : When an area or close attack targeting your AC or Reflex defense misses you but deals damage on a miss, you take no damage from the attack.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Lightning Transport
html:
Lightning Transport

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Con 13, wizard
Benefit : When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points or fewer with a wizard lightning power, you can teleport a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Phantasmal Destruction
html:
Phantasmal Destruction

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, wizard
Benefit : When you have combat advantage against a creature, any wizard illusion power that you use against that creature scores a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Sympathetic Transference
html:
Sympathetic Transference

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, wizard
Benefit : When you immobilize, restrain, or slow an enemy, choose an ally within 20 squares of you that is also suffering the same condition. End that condition.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 42.

name: Armor of Winter
html:
Armor of Winter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Invoker, Covenant of Wrath class feature, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Any undead hit by your armor of wrath power also takes 1d6 cold damage. If this attack bloodies an undead target, it is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Bitter Challenge
html:
Bitter Challenge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Paladin, divine challenge power
Benefit : Whenever a target takes damage from your divine challenge, it is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Dark Mantle
html:
Dark Mantle

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric, healing word power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Whenever you use healing word, you can forgo granting the extra hit points to instead grant resist necrotic 5 to the target until the end of your next turn. Increase the resistance to 10 at 11th level, and 20 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Dreadful Doom
html:
Dreadful Doom

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, invoker, Covenant of Malediction class feature
Benefit : You can push a target under the effect of maledictor’s doom power 1 square whenever it is hit by a fear, cold, or necrotic attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Fate's Warning
html:
Fate's Warning

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cleric, divine fortune power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Whenever you hit with an attack or succeed on a saving throw benefiting from divine fortune, you also gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Grave Fortune
html:
Grave Fortune

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, cleric, divine fortune power
Benefit : When you hit with an attack benefiting from divine fortune, your attack deals extra necrotic damage equal to your Constitution or Dexterity modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Memory of Death
html:
Memory of Death

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger, oath of enmity power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : When you target an undead creature with oath of enmity, the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Pervasive GloomPervasive Gloom
html:
Pervasive Gloom

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Shadar-kai, any divine class, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : You gain the Channel Divinity power pervasive gloom.


Feat Utility Pervasive Gloom

Night falls where you stand.

Encounter Divine , Zone
Free Action Close burst 1

Channel Divinity : You can use only one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

Trigger : You hit an enemy with an attack

Effect : The burst creates a zone of shadows that lasts until the start of your next turn. Squares within the zone are heavily obscured.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Reaping Vengeance
html:
Reaping Vengeance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : If the creature triggering your dark reaping was also your oath of enmity target, you deal 1d8 extra necrotic damage with dark reaping, for a total of 2d8 + your Constitution modifier necrotic damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Restless Dead
html:
Restless Dead

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : While you are at 0 hit points or fewer and still conscious, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and all defenses.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Revenant's Challenge
html:
Revenant's Challenge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Revenant, paladin, divine challenge power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Whenever a target you marked takes damage from divine challenge, it also gains vulnerable 5 necrotic until the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 64.

name: Shadow LegacyShadow Legacy
html:
Shadow Legacy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Shadar-kai, any divine class, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : You gain the Channel Divinity power shadow legacy.


Feat Utility Shadow Legacy

You extend the ancient covenant between your people and the Raven Queen to an ally in danger.

Encounter Divine , Teleportation
Immediate Reaction Ranged 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

Trigger : An attack bloodies an ally within range

Target : The triggering ally

Effect : The target either teleports 3 squares or gains insubstantial until the start of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Shadowfell Guidance
html:
Shadowfell Guidance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger, divine guidance power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : When an ally hits with an attack benefiting from your divine guidance, the ally’s attack deals extra necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Black Mantle
html:
Black Mantle

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, avenger, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : While wearing cloth armor or no armor and not using a shield, you gain resist 5 cold and resist 5 necrotic against attacks from your oath of enmity target. At 21st level, increase this resistance to 10.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Chilling Oath
html:
Chilling Oath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, shadar-kai, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : When you use oath of enmity, your target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Covenant of the Raven Queen
html:
Covenant of the Raven Queen

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, invoker, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Whenever you hit an undead with a divine encounter or daily attack power, you gain resist necrotic equal to your Constitution or Intelligence modifier until the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Raven Queen's Outrage
html:
Raven Queen's Outrage

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, cleric, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Whenever you hit an undead creature with an encounter or daily power with the radiant keyword, you can also slide that creature 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Raven Queen's Scorn
html:
Raven Queen's Scorn

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, avenger, oath of enmity power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : When you use oath of enmity against an undead enemy, you teleport to any space adjacent to the target as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Echo of Letherna
html:
Echo of Letherna

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, any divine class, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Your divine attack powers that deal radiant damage instead deal necrotic and radiant damage. These prayers gain the necrotic keyword.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Harvester of Sorrows
html:
Harvester of Sorrows

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit : Whenever you reduce the target of your oath of enmity to 0 hit points, any enemy you can see within 10 squares grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 65.

name: Vistani Heritage [Vistani Bloodline]Evil Eye of the Vistani
html:
Vistani Heritage [Vistani Bloodline]

Prerequisite : Humanoid race
Benefit : You gain evil eye of the Vistani as an encounter power. Additionally, you gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks made against other Vistani. You have mastered the Vistani Blooding ritual and can perform it.


Feat Attack Evil Eye of the Vistani

You cast a baleful look upon your enemy, forcing it to cower before you.

Encounter Charm
Minor Action Ranged 10

Target : One creature

Attack : Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 3 vs. Will
Level 11: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 6 vs. Will
Level 21: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 9 vs. Will

Hit : Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to you and cannot willingly move closer to you.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 84.

name: Advantageous Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Advantageous Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : When you hit a target with your evil eye of the Vistani, the target grants combat advantage to all your allies for the duration of the power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Black Vistani Cat [Familiar, Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Black Vistani Cat [Familiar, Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Any arcane class, cat familiar, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : Your evil eye of the Vistani can originate from your active cat familiar. Using evil eye of the Vistani in this way does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Cosmic Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Cosmic Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Sorcerer, Cosmic Magic class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : Evil eye of the Vistani deals fire and radiant damage equal to your Cosmic Power damage bonus.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Covenant Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Covenant Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : As a free action, you can expend your use of your Channel Divinity class feature to regain the use of evil eye of the Vistani.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Enmity's Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Enmity's Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : When you use evil eye of the Vistani against your oath of enmity target, you do not provoke opportunity attacks from that target. If no other enemy is adjacent to you when you do so, you make two attack rolls, taking either result. If you hit, you deal 1d6 radiant damage in addition to the power’s normal hit effect.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Eye of Paranoia [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Eye of Paranoia [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : When you hit a target with your evil eye of the Vistani, the target cannot make opportunity attacks or immediate action attacks for the duration of the power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Ferocious Rebuke
html:
Ferocious Rebuke

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, infernal wrath racial power
Benefit : When you use the infernal wrath power, you can push the target 1 square in addition to any damage you deal.


Update (4/8/2010)
In the Benefit entry, delete “and hit with an attack.”

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 195.

name: Eye Wand [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Eye Wand [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wizard, Wand of Accuracy class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : If you miss with an attack roll modified by your Wand of Accuracy class feature, you can use evil eye of the Vistani, if available, as a free action against the target you missed.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Fell Vistani Hound [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Fell Vistani Hound [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, wolf beast companion, Beast Mastery class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : While you are flanking an enemy, your wolf has combat advantage against that enemy.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Maledictor's Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Maledictor's Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Invoker, Covenant of Malediction class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : When you hit a target with evil eye of the Vistani, you can slide the target 1 square. Until the end of your next turn, whenever the target misses with an attack roll, you can slide the target 1 square as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 85.

name: Nature's Vindictive Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Nature's Vindictive Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, Wild Shape class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can use evil eye of the Vistani while in beast form as a minor action that does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Orb of the Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Orb of the Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wizard, Orb of Imposition class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You treat evil eye of the Vistani as though it were an at-will wizard spell for the purposes of your Orb of Imposition.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vestige of Vistan [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vestige of Vistan [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, vestige pact, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You add Vistan to your primary vestiges, gaining access to the following pact boon when Vistan is your active vestige.
Vistan Pact Boon: When an enemy under the effect of your Warlock’s Curse drops to 0 hit points, you can slide a different creature currently affected by your Warlock’s Curse a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Eyes of the Vestige Augment (Vistan): You slide the target 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Warlock's Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Warlock's Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : When you hit with evil eye of the Vistani, you can add the extra damage from your Warlock’s Curse, even if you have already used your extra curse damage this turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Fencer [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Fencer [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls with melee or close attacks with a light blade or a heavy blade against a target currently affected by your evil eye of the Vistani.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Guardian [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Guardian [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can master and perform binding or warding rituals as though you had the Ritual Caster feat. Once per day, you can ignore the component cost of a binding or warding ritual your have mastered of your level or lower.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Healer [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Healer [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can master and perform restoration rituals as though you had the Ritual Caster feat. Once per day, you can ignore the component cost of a restoration ritual you have mastered of your level or lower.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Jongleur [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Jongleur [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can master and perform Bard rituals as though you had the Ritual Caster feat. Once per day, you can ignore the component cost of a ritual you have mastered of your level or lower that has Bard as a prerequisite.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Knife Fighting [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Knife Fighting [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : When you miss the target of your evil eye of the Vistani with a melee or close attack with a light blade, you can choose to either shift 1 square or move your speed as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Pathfinding [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Pathfinding [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can master and perform exploration and travel rituals as though you had the Ritual Caster feat. Once per day, you can ignore the component cost of an exploration or travel ritual you have mastered of your level or lower.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 86.

name: Vistani Seer [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Seer [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can master and perform divination and scrying rituals as though you had the Ritual Caster feat. Once per day, you can ignore the component cost of a divination or scrying ritual you have mastered of your level or lower.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Vistani Thief [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Thief [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You can master and perform deception rituals as though you had the Ritual Caster feat.
Once per day, you can ignore the component cost of a deception ritual you have mastered of your level or lower.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Wild Magic Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Wild Magic Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Sorcerer, Wild Magic class feature, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : Evil eye of the Vistani deals damage of the same type as your current Wild Soul damage type, and the damage is equal to your Chaos Power damage bonus.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Mark of the Evil Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Mark of the Evil Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, fighter, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : Whenever you would make an attack as the result of your Combat Challenge feature, you can use evil eye of the Vistani, if available, on the same target as a free action without provoking opportunity attacks before making your attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Prophetic Preparation [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Prophetic Preparation [Vistani Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, wizard, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : Once per day, as a free action, you can swap one daily attack spell you didn’t prepare in place of one you did prepare. Also once per day, as a free action, you can swap one utility spell you didn’t prepare in place of one you did prepare. You choose the replacement spell at the time you use it.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Persistent Eye [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Persistent Eye [Vistani Bloodline]

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : Instead of lasting until the end of your next turn, the target of your evil eye of the Vistani grants you combat advantage and cannot willingly move closer to you (save ends).

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Vistani Foresight [Vistani Bloodline]
html:
Vistani Foresight [Vistani Bloodline]

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Vistani Heritage
Benefit : You gain +2 to initiative. Additionally, you gain an additional action point after an extended rest.

Published in Dragon Magazine 380 , page(s) 87.

name: Practiced Study
html:
Practiced Study

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Any martial class
Benefit : You can master and perform martial practices. You learn one martial practice of your level or lower.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 119, Martial Power 2 , page(s) 138.

name: Bold Gamble
html:
Bold Gamble

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever you spend an action point to make an extra attack, you can choose to use this feat. If the attack hits, the enemy grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. If the attack misses, you grant combat advantage to the enemy until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Courageous Word
html:
Courageous Word

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Bravura Presence class feature, inspiring word power
Benefit : When you use inspiring word, the target can choose to take advantage of this feat. If the target does, he or she grants combat advantage until the start of your next turn but deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier against the next enemy he or she hits before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Covered Retreat
html:
Covered Retreat

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Resourceful Presence class feature
Benefit : When an enemy provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can take an opportunity action to let one ally adjacent to you shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier to a square not adjacent to the provoking enemy as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Emboldening Presence
html:
Emboldening Presence

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature
Benefit : When an ally with line of sight to you expends his or her second wind, he or she gains a bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of his or her next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Imaginative Reaction
html:
Imaginative Reaction

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Combat Leader class feature, Resourceful Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever you roll initiative, you can subtract 4 from your check result to increase the result of one or two allies who benefit from Combat Leader. One ally gains a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier and the other gains a bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Inspiring Aid
html:
Inspiring Aid

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever you or an ally who can hear you and who has line of sight to you takes the aid another, aid attack, or aid defense action, the bonus granted to the target equals +4 instead of +2. This effect replaces the normal +2 bonus to the attack roll. An ally can benefit from this feat only once per attack.


Update (9/10/2010)
Replace the feat’s Benefit entry.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Prepared for Anything
html:
Prepared for Anything

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Combat Leader class feature
Benefit : Any ally who benefits from your Combat Leader class feature gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of his or her first turn in an encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Resourceful Donation
html:
Resourceful Donation

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Resourceful Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever you spend a healing surge, you can divide the hit points regained between yourself and one ally adjacent to you in any proportion.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 29.

name: Risky Charge
html:
Risky Charge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit : When you charge, you can choose to use this feat. If the charge attack hits, you also knock the enemy prone. If the attack misses, the enemy can make a melee basic attack against you as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 30.

name: Rousing Charge
html:
Rousing Charge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Resourceful Presence class feature
Benefit : When you charge, you can forgo the bonus to your attack roll to instead grant one ally with line of sight to you a +2 bonus to his or her next attack roll against the same enemy.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 30.

name: Rousing Resurgence
html:
Rousing Resurgence

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature
Benefit : Allies who expend their second winds while they have line of sight to you also gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier plus one-half your level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 30.

name: Shrewd Positioning
html:
Shrewd Positioning

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Combat Leader class feature, Tactical Presence class feature
Benefit : When you make an initiative check, you can slide each ally benefiting from Combat Leader 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Stirring Word
html:
Stirring Word

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature, inspiring word power
Benefit : When you use inspiring word, the target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Tactical Adjustment
html:
Tactical Adjustment

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Tactical Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever an ally within your line of sight spends an action point to make an extra attack, you can slide that ally 1 square before or after the attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Tactical Feint
html:
Tactical Feint

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Tactical Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever you spend an action point to make an extra attack, one ally within 3 squares of you gains a bonus equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier to his or her next attack roll against a target of your attack before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Defense of the Inspired
html:
Defense of the Inspired

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature
Benefit : Whenever an ally with line of sight to you takes the total defense action, the bonus to his or her defenses equals your Charisma modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Tactician's Word
html:
Tactician's Word

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlord, Tactical Presence class feature, inspiring word power
Benefit : When you use inspiring word, the target gains a bonus equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier to its next attack roll made before the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Versatile Word
html:
Versatile Word

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlord, Resourceful Presence class feature, inspiring word power
Benefit : When you use inspiring word, in addition to the benefit of the power, the target can either shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Charisma modifier as a free action or gain a bonus to AC equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier until the start of its next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 31.

name: Adamant Arrow Student [Lesser Style]
html:
Adamant Arrow Student [Lesser Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger or warlord; proficiency with greatbow or longbow
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Perception checks.
When you are attacking with a greatbow or a longbow and you hit an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you can push that enemy 1 square.


Associated Powers: Nimble Strike , Paint the Bulls-Eye

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 110.

name: Adamant Arrow Commander [Greater Style]
html:
Adamant Arrow Commander [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Adamant Arrow Student feat
Benefit : When you are attacking with a greatbow or a longbow and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.
When you hit an enemy and at least one other enemy is providing it with cover from your attack, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier to one enemy providing cover to it.
You can use a power associated with this feat as a ranged power instead of a melee power.


Associated Powers: Deadly Inspiration , Denying Smite , Inspiring War Cry , Sunder Armor , Warlord's Doom , Wounding Focus

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 110.

name: Black Hood Student [Lesser Style]
html:
Black Hood Student [Lesser Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, ranger, or warlord; proficiency with any two-handed axe
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.
When you are attacking with a two-handed axe and you deliver a coup de grace against an enemy, your attack deals 1[W] extra damage against that enemy.
When you are attacking with a two-handed axe and you hit an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll if that enemy is slowed, or a +5 bonus to the damage roll if that enemy is helpless or immobilized.


Update (4/13/2010)
In the Associated At-Will Powers entry, replace “furious smash” with “wolf pack tactics.”


Associated Powers: Marauder's Rush , Sure Strike , Wolf Pack Tactics

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 112.

name: Black Hood Executioner [Greater Style]
html:
Black Hood Executioner [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Black Hood Student feat
Benefit : When you are attacking with a two-handed axe and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.
If you score a critical hit, each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
You can use a power associated with this feat in place of a melee basic attack when making an opportunity attack.


Associated Powers: Blood Begets Blood , Deadly Inspiration , Headstrong Bravery , Inspiring War Cry , Provoke Overextension , Warlord's Doom

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 113.

name: Blade and Buckler Duelist
html:
Blade and Buckler Duelist

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, proficiency with light shields
Benefit : The shield bonus to defenses from your light shield increase to +2.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 70.

name: Buckler Duelist
html:
Buckler Duelist

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, proficiency with light shields
Benefit : If a rogue power gives you a power bonus to defenses and you wield a light shield, increase that bonus by 1.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 70.

name: Duelist's Panache
html:
Duelist's Panache

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Charisma 13, Rogue
Benefit : You gain your Charisma modifier as a feat bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks.


Revision (11/30/2009)
Page 20: Duelist’s Panache: Change to a feat bonus.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 70.

name: Flash of the Blade
html:
Flash of the Blade

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, proficiency with rapiers
Benefit : While wielding a rapier, if you are the only creature adjacent to the target you may use your sneak attack damage even if you do not have combat advantage against the target with this attack.


Revision (11/30/2009)
Page 20: Flash of the Blade benefit is change to, While wielding a rapier, if you are the only creature adjacent to the target you may use your sneak attack damage even if you do not have combat advantage against the target with this attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 70.

name: Irrefutable Blade
html:
Irrefutable Blade

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, proficiency with rapiers
Benefit : Whenever you miss with a rogue encounter attack while wielding a rapier, you deal damage equal to your Charisma modifier to the target you missed.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 70.

name: Versatile Duelist
html:
Versatile Duelist

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue
Benefit : You gain proficiency with all one-handed, military heavy blades. If a rogue power requires you to wield a light blade, you can use that power with a one-handed heavy blade and can also deal your Sneak Attack damage while using a one-handed heavy blade with that power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 70.

name: Cruel Whimsy
html:
Cruel Whimsy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, fey pact
Benefit : When an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect bestowed by one of your warlock powers, you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 52.

name: Diminishing Spirit Curse
html:
Diminishing Spirit Curse

Prerequisite : Warlock, vestige pact
Benefit : When you hit a bloodied enemy under your Warlock’s Curse, it takes a -2 penalty to its next saving throw before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Offering to the Prisoner
html:
Offering to the Prisoner

Prerequisite : Warlock, infernal pact
Benefit : Instead of gaining temporary hit points from dark one’s blessing, you can add 2 extra damage to the next warlock attack you make before the end of your next turn. The extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level and to 6 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Patron's Guidance
html:
Patron's Guidance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Shadow Walk class feature
Benefit : When you take this feat, choose two skills. While you have concealment from Shadow Walk, you gain a +2 bonus to skill checks with these skills.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Spirit Poison
html:
Spirit Poison

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, dark pact
Benefit : When you deal necrotic or poison damage with a warlock power, you deal necrotic and poison damage instead.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Ulban's Flare
html:
Ulban's Flare

Prerequisite : Warlock, star pact
Benefit : When you hit a creature with dire radiance and you have concealment or total concealment from that target, the target takes 2 extra damage and a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level and to 6 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Yorgrix's Brutality
html:
Yorgrix's Brutality

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, dark pact
Benefit : When you damage a creature with a warlock attack power while that creature is taking ongoing damage, the creature takes 2 extra poison damage. The extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level and to 6 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Beseech Patron
html:
Beseech Patron

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, Warlock’s Curse
Benefit : When you spend an action point to take an extra action and use an arcane power, you gain the benefit of your pact boon as if an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse had dropped to 0 hit points or fewer.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Bleak Guide's Return
html:
Bleak Guide's Return

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, vestige pact
Benefit : Whenever you score a critical hit against a target with your eyes of the vestige power, the next warlock encounter attack you use before the end of your next turn is not expended if you miss every target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Eochaid's Lure
html:
Eochaid's Lure

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, fey pact
Benefit : When you leave a square because of the Misty Step pact boon, you can slide each enemy adjacent to that square 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Message of Doom Spurned
html:
Message of Doom Spurned

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, star pact
Benefit : When you have a bonus from the Fate of the Void pact boon, you can apply it to all your defenses as an immediate interrupt when an enemy hits you. When you do, it lasts until the triggering attack is resolved, and then the bonus is spent.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Feywild Protection
html:
Feywild Protection

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Eladrin, fey step racial power
Benefit : When you use the fey step power, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.


Revision (7/28/2008)
Replace word "your" with "the" before "fey step". Remove "your" before "defenses". All changes to Benefits sentence

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 203.

name: Prisoner's Resolve
html:
Prisoner's Resolve

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, infernal pact
Benefit : If you fail a saving throw, you can take 10 damage to make another saving throw against the same effect. You can do this only once per effect per round. This damage cannot be reduced in any way.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 53.

name: Cooperative Chance
html:
Cooperative Chance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, bard
Benefit : You can use your second chance power when an attack hits an ally within 10 squares of you. If the attack misses, you can slide that ally a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 82.

name: Defensive Bluff
html:
Defensive Bluff

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you can, as part of the same action, make a Bluff check to gain combat advantage or to create a diversion to hide (Player’s Handbook page 183).

Published in Dragon Magazine 381 , page(s) 82.

name: Halfling Fast Talk
html:
Halfling Fast Talk

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling
