name: Dusk Elf Stealth [Elf Bloodline]
html:
Dusk Elf Stealth [Elf Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf
Benefit : All allies within 6 squares of you that do not have this feat gain a +1 racial bonus to Stealth checks.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Add [Elf Bloodline] next to the feat name.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 69.

name: Dusk Elf Weapon Training
html:
Dusk Elf Weapon Training

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dusk Elf Stealth
Benefit : You gain proficiency with simple and military light blades, and you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with these weapons. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 69.

name: Gathering Night
html:
Gathering Night

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dusk Elf Stealth
Benefit : Whenever you take the total defense action while you have any concealment, you become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 69.

name: Gloaming Ward
html:
Gloaming Ward

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dusk Elf Stealth
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied in an encounter, you gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 69.

name: Halfling Agility
html:
Halfling Agility

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, second chance racial power
Benefit : When you use the halfling second chance power, the attacker takes a –2 penalty to the new attack roll.


Revision (7/28/2008)
Replace Benefits text with "When you use the second chance power, the attacker takes a -2 penalty to the new attack roll."

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 195.

name: Sehanine's Boon
html:
Sehanine's Boon

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dusk Elf Stealth
Benefit : Whenever you spend a healing surge while you have total concealment, you regain extra hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 70.

name: Umbral Wind
html:
Umbral Wind

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dusk Elf Stealth
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you gain concealment until the end of your next turn instead of gaining a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn. If you already have concealment, you instead gain total concealment.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 70.

name: Avenging Resolution
html:
Avenging Resolution

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : When you attack a target of your oath of enmity with a weapon attack, treat all rolls of a 1 or 2 on the damage dice as though the result were a 3 on the die.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 40.

name: Distant Vengeance
html:
Distant Vengeance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : As long as you are within 10 squares of your oath of enmity target and no other enemies are adjacent to you, you gain the benefit of your oath of enmity on all ranged basic attacks against your oath of enmity target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 40.

name: Oath of UrgencyOath of Urgency
html:
Oath of Urgency

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger, Channel Divinity class feature, oath of enmity power
Benefit : You gain the Channel Divinity power oath of urgency.


Feat Utility Oath of Urgency

You utter a prayer of need, calling upon your god to bring swift vengeance upon a new foe.

Encounter Divine
Minor Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.

Effect : The current target of your oath of enmity is no longer the target of that power. You regain your oath of enmity power and use it as a free action immediately.


Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 40.

name: Unyielding Pursuit
html:
Unyielding Pursuit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Avenger
Benefit : If you end a run action adjacent to a target of your oath of enmity, you take no penalty on attack rolls against your oath of enmity target from that run action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 40.

name: Arbiter of Justice
html:
Arbiter of Justice

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : You deal +2 damage against bloodied targets. Additionally, whenever an ally bloodies or reduces your oath of enmity target to 0 hit points, you may act as though you had bloodied or reduced the target to 0 hit points.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 40.

name: Exposing Oath
html:
Exposing Oath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : While a creature is your oath of enmity target, your attacks ignore any resist radiant or resist necrotic the target has.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Halo of Isolation
html:
Halo of Isolation

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : While adjacent to your oath of enmity target, all other enemies treat squares adjacent to you as difficult terrain.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Painful Oath
html:
Painful Oath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : The first time you hit your oath of enmity target each turn, you deal extra radiant and necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Elven Precision
html:
Elven Precision

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, elven accuracy racial power
Benefit : When you use the elven accuracy power, you gain a +2 bonus to the new attack roll.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 194.

name: Halo of Tethering
html:
Halo of Tethering

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : When an oath of enmity target that is adjacent to you shifts, you can shift 1 square into a square it vacated.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Halo of Warding
html:
Halo of Warding

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : While you are adjacent to your oath of enmity target, you can make an opportunity attack against any other enemy that moves into a square adjacent to you, provided the enemy does not shift or is not moved into that square by teleportation or forced movement.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Hand of Divine Guidance
html:
Hand of Divine Guidance

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : You score critical hits on a roll of 19-20 against your oath of enmity target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Vengeful Declaration
html:
Vengeful Declaration

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : You can use oath of enmity as a free action on your turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 41.

name: Ancient Soul
html:
Ancient Soul

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, Dragon Magic sorcerer, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : Your dragon breath power is considered an arcane attack power.
In addition, if your dragon breath power deals damage of the same type as your Dragon Magic class feature gives you resistance to, you gain the following benefit:
Whenever you take damage of the type dealt by your dragon breath (after the damage dealt is reduced by your resistance), you regain the use of your dragon breath if you have already expended it in this encounter.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22.

name: Bolstering Breath
html:
Bolstering Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : Your dragon breath power targets enemies in the area, instead of all creatures in the area.
In addition, allies in the area of your dragon breath gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22.

name: Covenant of Io
html:
Covenant of Io

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, invoker, Divine Covenant class feature
Benefit : Your dragon breath power is considered a divine attack power. In addition, when you use an invoker at-will attack power that has a burst area of effect, you can choose to make it a close blast 3 instead of an area power. The other effects of the power are unchanged.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22.

name: Daunting Breath
html:
Daunting Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, trained in Intimidate
Benefit : Each creature you hit with the dragon breath power is marked until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22.

name: Draconic Blast
html:
Draconic Blast

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, eldritch blast power
Benefit : You can choose to make your eldritch blast deal the same damage type as your dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22.

name: Improved Inspiring Word
html:
Improved Inspiring Word

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord
Benefit : Add your Charisma modifier to the hit points restored by your inspiring word.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Draconic Combat Challenge
html:
Draconic Combat Challenge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : When you hit with the attack granted by your Combat Challenge, you deal 3 extra damage of the same damage type as your dragon breath power. The extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level and 5 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22.

name: Draconic Enmity
html:
Draconic Enmity

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, avenger, oath of enmity power, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : If the target of your oath of enmity is the only target of your dragon breath, you can make two attack rolls and use either result, as if you were making a melee attack against the target.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23.

name: Draconic Healing
html:
Draconic Healing

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, cleric, healing word power
Benefit : When you use healing word while you are bloodied, the target regains additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23.

name: Draconic Hunter
html:
Draconic Hunter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, ranger, Hunter’s Quarry class feature
Benefit : When you hit your quarry with your dragon breath, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack rolls against that target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23.

name: Patient Hunter
html:
Patient Hunter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, pounce power, wild shape power
Benefit : When you hit a target with an attack using the pounce power, the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Ruthless Killer
html:
Ruthless Killer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, grasping claws power, wild shape power
Benefit : When you hit a target with the grasping claws power, instead of slowing the target you can instead choose for the target to be immobilized until the end of your next turn. If you are ever not adjacent to the target, the immobilized effect ends.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Unstoppable Beast
html:
Unstoppable Beast

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, savage rend power, wild shape power
Benefit : When you hit a target with the savage rend power, you can shift 1 square into the space occupied by your target after you slide it.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Brutal Grappler Form
html:
Brutal Grappler Form

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form, you gain a +2 feat bonus to grab attempts. Additionally, any target you are grabbing while in beast form grants you combat advantage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Fierce Thrasher Form
html:
Fierce Thrasher Form

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form and use a beast form power that pushes, pulls, or slides the target, increase the distance of the push, pull, or slide by 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Scuttling Crawler Form
html:
Scuttling Crawler Form

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form, you gain a +5 feat bonus to Athletics checks to climb and can climb at your speed.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Venomous Fang Form
html:
Venomous Fang Form

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form, all your melee attacks with the poison keyword ignore the first 10 points of the target’s poison resist. This increases to 15 points at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 54.

name: Allegiance to the Daughter
html:
Allegiance to the Daughter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Infernal Pact
Benefit : Whenever you reduce an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points with a warlock attack, the enemy’s space fills with hellfire until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters or starts its turn within the square takes fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 51.

name: Dark Thaumaturgy
html:
Dark Thaumaturgy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Daughter’s Promises feat
Benefit : You gain a +3 bonus to all skill checks related to performing a ritual for each milestone you have achieved so far today.


Update (2/18/2010)
Change benefit to “You gain a +3 bonus to all skill checks related to performing a ritual for each milestone you have achieved so far today.”

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 51.

name: Daughter's Promises
html:
Daughter's Promises

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Infernal Pact
Benefit : Replace your pact boon with the following: When an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse drops to 0 hit points, you deal fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level to any enemy within 1 square of that enemy. You also gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 51.

name: Devil's Favor
html:
Devil's Favor

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Infernal Pact
Benefit : Whenever you use your second wind, you can choose to regain no hit points to instead gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and damage rolls until the end of your next turn.


Deletion (2/18/2010)
Remove defenses from list of bonuses.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 51.

name: Glasya's Rebuke
html:
Glasya's Rebuke

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Infernal Pact, hellish rebuke power
Benefit : Each time a target takes damage from hellish rebuke because you took damage, one enemy within 5 squares of the target also takes 5 fire damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 52.

name: Hellbound Heart
html:
Hellbound Heart

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Infernal Pact
Benefit : Whenever you spend a healing surge, you gain resist fire equal to 5 + one-half your level and a +2 bonus to your next saving throw before the end of your next turn. If you already have fire resistance, you can instead increase that resistance by 5 until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 52.

name: Infernal Soul
html:
Infernal Soul

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlock, Infernal Pact
Benefit : While you have temporary hit points, you gain resist 5 fire. If you already have fire resistance, add 5 to your resistance.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 52.

name: Flitting Shadows
html:
Flitting Shadows

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, Warlock's Curse class feature.
Benefit : Whenever you hit an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse with an encounter or daily warlock power, you can reduce the Warlock’s Curse damage you deal to teleport the target. You can teleport the target 3 squares for each die of Warlock’s Curse damage you give up.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 52.

name: Sickening Shadows
html:
Sickening Shadows

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, warlock, Shadow Walk class feature
Benefit : Whenever an enemy misses you with a melee attack while you have concealment from Shadow Walk, that enemy takes necrotic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 52.

name: Draconic Majesty
html:
Draconic Majesty

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, any divine class, Channel Divinity class feature
Benefit : When you use a Channel Divinity power, bloodied enemies within 5 squares of you take a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23.

name: Focused Breath
html:
Focused Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : When you use your dragon breath, you can choose to make it a close blast 1 instead of a close blast 3. If you do, add 2 to the damage roll. Increase this to 4 at 11th level, and to 6 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23.

name: Glorious Victory
html:
Glorious Victory

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, any martial class
Benefit : Once per encounter, when you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer with an attack, you can spend a healing surge.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23.

name: Inspiring Triumph
html:
Inspiring Triumph

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, barbarian, roar of triumph power
Benefit : Allies in the burst of your roar of triumph gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Io's Challenge
html:
Io's Challenge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, paladin, divine challenge power
Benefit : When a creature takes damage from your divine challenge, add your Constitution modifier to the damage it takes if you are bloodied.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Powerful Breath
html:
Powerful Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : Choose an ability score. Use this ability score for attack and damage rolls for your dragon breath from now on.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Raging Drake Form
html:
Raging Drake Form

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, druid, wild shape power, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls while bloodied.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Surprising Breath
html:
Surprising Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : When you hit a creature with your dragon breath, you gain combat advantage against that creature until the start of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Burning Breath
html:
Burning Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals fire damage
Benefit : Choose one creature hit by your dragon breath. That creature takes ongoing fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier (save ends).
Choose one creature hit by your dragon breath. That creature takes ongoing fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier (save ends).

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Critical Breath
html:
Critical Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : When you score a critical hit with your dragon breath, the target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). The ongoing damage is the same type (or types) as the damage from your dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Corrosive Breath
html:
Corrosive Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals acid damage
Benefit : Each creature hit by your dragon breath takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Frost Breath
html:
Frost Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals cold damage
Benefit : Each creature hit by your dragon breath is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Opportunity Breath
html:
Opportunity Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : You can use your dragon breath as an opportunity action whenever you would be allowed an opportunity attack. You must include the enemy who triggered the opportunity attack in the blast of your dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24.

name: Spirit Breath
html:
Spirit Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, any primal class
Benefit : When you use a daily primal attack power with a keyword that matches the damage type of your dragon breath, you regain the use of dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Thundering Breath
html:
Thundering Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals lightning damage
Benefit : Your dragon breath deals thunder and lightning damage. You can push each target hit by your dragon breath a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Toxic Breath
html:
Toxic Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals poison damage
Benefit : Choose one creature hit by your dragon breath. That creature is weakened (save ends).

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Concussive Breath
html:
Concussive Breath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals lightning damage, Thundering Breath feat
Benefit : Your dragon breath deals thunder and lightning damage. Each target hit by your dragon breath is dazed until the end of your next turn, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.


Update (4/13/2010)
In the Prerequisite entry of the feat, replace “Thunder Breath feat” with “Thundering Breath feat.”

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Conflagration Breath
html:
Conflagration Breath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals fire damage, Burning Breath feat
Benefit : When you use your dragon breath, you can choose to make its area a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the zone or enters the zone takes 10 fire damage.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Debilitating Breath
html:
Debilitating Breath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals poison damage, Toxic Breath feat
Benefit : Each target hit by your dragon breath is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Dissolving Breath
html:
Dissolving Breath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals acid damage, Corrosive Breath feat
Benefit : Each creature hit by your dragon breath takes a -3 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Draconic Restoration
html:
Draconic Restoration

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you regain the use of your dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Draconic Triumph
html:
Draconic Triumph

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : When you reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points, you regain the use of your dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Freezing Breath
html:
Freezing Breath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power that deals cold damage, Frost Breath feat
Benefit : Each creature hit by your dragon breath is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 25.

name: Horns of the Shadow Reaper
html:
Horns of the Shadow Reaper

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Minotaur, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you charge and use your goring charge racial power you and target has at least one of your assassin’s shrouds on it, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack roll and, after resolving the attack, you can shift half your speed as part of the charge.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Change benefit to “When you charge and use your goring charge racial power you and target has at least one of your assassin’s shrouds on it, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack roll and, after resolving the attack, you can shift half your speed as part of the charge.”

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 30.

name: Hunter in the Gloom
html:
Hunter in the Gloom

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Shadar-kai, assassin, shadow jaunt racial power
Benefit : While you are insubstantial due to your shadow jaunt power, any weapon attacks you make against AC instead are made against the target’s Reflex.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 30.

name: Initiate of Three Masks
html:
Initiate of Three Masks

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Changeling, assassin
Benefit : You can use a Stealth check in place of Bluff with your changeling trick racial power. In addition, if that check succeeds, the target cannot make opportunity attacks against you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 30.

name: Keeper of the Black Flame
html:
Keeper of the Black Flame

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you hit a target that has at least one of your shrouds on it with your darkfire racial power the target is subject to an additional shroud.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Change benefit to read “When you hit a target that has at least one of your shrouds on it with your darkfire racial power the target is subject to an additional shroud.”

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 30.

name: Maw of the Hungry Killer
html:
Maw of the Hungry Killer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Gnoll, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you reduce a creature that has at least one of your shrouds on it to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + the number of shrouds on the target. If you invoked your shrouds on the attack that reduced the creature to 0 hit points, you can also teleport to a space adjacent to your nearest ally within 10 squares.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 30.

name: Mind of Flawless Sight
html:
Mind of Flawless Sight

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Kalashtar, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : If a creature has at least one of your shrouds on it, you ignore the -2 penalties for concealment or cover on your attack rolls against that creature.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 30.

name: Resolve of the Iron Terminator
html:
Resolve of the Iron Terminator

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warforged, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : You gain resist to attacks from any creature with your shrouds on it equal to the number of shrouds on the creature.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Seeker of the Devouring Dark
html:
Seeker of the Devouring Dark

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When a creature with at least one of your shrouds on it leaves the area of your cloud of darkness, it takes damage from your shrouds as if you had hit it with an attack, and your shrouds vanish from the target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Fade Into Shadow
html:
Fade Into Shadow

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, assassin, shadow step power
Benefit : When you become bloodied, you may use your shadow step as an immediate reaction.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Change the benefit to “When you become bloodied, you may use your shadow step as an immediate reaction.”

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Grave Step
html:
Grave Step

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, assassin, shadow step power
Benefit : If you reduce a creature to 0 hit points or fewer during your turn, you can use shadow step as a minor action during that turn without needing to begin or end the teleport adjacent to a creature.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Killer in the Crowd
html:
Killer in the Crowd

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, assassin
Benefit : Your enemies do not grant cover to your targets. You gain cover from your enemies.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Shadow's Inexorable Grasp
html:
Shadow's Inexorable Grasp

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Assassin, assassin’s shroud power
Benefit : When you are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, any creature within 10 squares of you with at least one of your shrouds on it takes damage from your assassin’s shrouds as if you had missed it with an attack, and your shrouds vanish from the target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Soul in Shadow
html:
Soul in Shadow

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, assassin
Benefit : You gain concealment against all creatures that are 5 or more squares away from you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Walker Through Shadows
html:
Walker Through Shadows

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, assassin
Benefit : While you are insubstantial, you also gain phasing.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Acolyte of the Veil [Multiclass Assassin]
html:
Acolyte of the Veil [Multiclass Assassin]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dex 13
Benefit : You gain training in the Acrobatics or Stealth skill. Once per encounter, you can use the shadow step power. In addition, you can wield ki focuses.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 31.

name: Darkfire Dancer
html:
Darkfire Dancer

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow
Benefit : If you are adjacent to a target affected by your darkfire, you can shift 2 squares as a move action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 66.

name: Drow EcclesiasticDrow Ecclesiastic
html:
Drow Ecclesiastic

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, Channel Divinity class feature
Benefit : You can invoke the power of the divine to use drow ecclesiastic.


Feat Utility Drow Ecclesiastic

Lolth punishes those who escape her wiles.

Encounter Divine , Poison
Immediate Reaction Ranged 5

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.

Trigger : An enemy within range succeeds on a saving throw to end a condition

Effect : The target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Requirement : Drow, Channel Divinity class feature


Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 66.

name: Knife in the Dark
html:
Knife in the Dark

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow
Benefit : You gain a +4 feat bonus to damage rolls against targets within your cloud of darkness. This bonus increases to +5 at 11th level, and +6 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Secret Recovery
html:
Secret Recovery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow
Benefit : When you succeed on a saving throw to end an effect, you can as a free action shift 1 square and make a Stealth check to hide if you have superior cover or total concealment.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Change benefit to read “When you succeed on a saving throw to end an effect, you can as a free action shift 1 square and make a Stealth check to hide if you have superior cover or total concealment.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Underdark Climber
html:
Underdark Climber

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Trained in Acrobatics
Benefit : You can use your Acrobatics skill in place of your Athletics checks to climb walls.
You also gain a +2 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Cloud of Poison
html:
Cloud of Poison

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, drow
Benefit : Any enemy who starts its turn within your cloud of darkness takes 5 poison damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Darkness Reign
html:
Darkness Reign

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, drow
Benefit : As long as you are within your cloud of darkness, you can sustain the effect as a standard action. Each time you sustain the effect, it lasts until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Spider CharmerSpider Charmer
html:
Spider Charmer

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, drow, Channel Divinity class feature
Benefit : You can invoke the power of the divine to use spider charmer.


Feat Attack Spider Charmer

You draw upon Lolth’s ability to command spiders and drow.

Encounter Charm , Divine , Implement
Standard Action Ranged 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.

Target : One spider or drow

Attack : Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will

Hit : The target spider or drow is dominated until the end of your next turn.

Requirement : 11th level, drow, Channel Divinity class feature


Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Venom Master
html:
Venom Master

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, drow
Benefit : When you hit a creature with your darkfire racial power, they gain vulnerability 5 poison until the end of the encounter.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Change benefit to read “When you hit a creature with your darkfire racial power they gains vulnerability 5 poison until the end of the encounter.”

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Web Spinner
html:
Web Spinner

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, drow
Benefit : When you score a critical hit on an opportunity attack, the target is also immobilized (save ends).

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Fist of Night
html:
Fist of Night

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, drow
Benefit : Once on your turn when you miss a target that is within your cloud of darkness with a melee attack, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action against a different target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Lolth Blessed
html:
Lolth Blessed

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, drow
Benefit : Any time you use an action point, you regain the use of your Lolthtouched racial ability during the encounter if you’ve already used it (and can use either cloud of darkness or darkfire).

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 67.

name: Traveler's CelerityTraveler's Celerity
html:
Traveler's Celerity

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th-level, Channel Divinity class feature, must worship the Traveler
Benefit : You gain the Channel Divinity power Traveler’s celerity.


Feat Utility Traveler's Celerity

The Traveler blesses those in a bind with an easy escape and fleet feet. Those who fail to make use of this gift suffer for it.

Encounter Divine
Minor Action Close burst 5

Channel Divinity : You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

Effect : The target gains a +2 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn, and it can make a saving throw against each slowed, immobilized, or restrained effect. If the target saves, the condition ends even if a save doesn’t normally end the condition.


Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 71.

name: Active Familiar [Familiar]
html:
Active Familiar [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : When you take a move action, you can also move your familiar its speed or shift it 1 square.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 28.

name: Cast Afar the Spirit [Familiar]
html:
Cast Afar the Spirit [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : When you switch your familiar into active mode, you can teleport it up to 5 squares.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 28.

name: Persistent Spirit [Familiar]
html:
Persistent Spirit [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : When your familiar is destroyed, an echo of its spirit remains. Treat your familiar as in its active state until the end of your next turn, at which time the spirit fades away.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 28.

name: Swift Familiar [Familiar]
html:
Swift Familiar [Familiar]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : You can switch your familiar between passive mode and active mode with a free action on your turn instead of a minor action. You can do so only once per turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 28.

name: Sight of the Familiar [Familiar]
html:
Sight of the Familiar [Familiar]

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : While your familiar is in passive mode, you can see through its eyes, benefiting from its special senses. In addition, after you return your familiar to passive mode from active mode, it can show you one image it saw during that period in active mode.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 29.

name: Space-Bending Spirit [Familiar]
html:
Space-Bending Spirit [Familiar]

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : Your familiar gains teleport 2 as an additional movement mode.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 29.

name: Aegis Accuracy
html:
Aegis Accuracy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : If a target marked by your Swordmage Aegis makes an attack and doesn’t include you as a target, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the marked creature until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 23.

name: Aegis Vitality
html:
Aegis Vitality

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : Whenever a creature marked by your Swordmage Aegis makes an attack that does not include you as a target, you gain 3 temporary hit points.
Increase the temporary hit points to 5 at 11th level, and to 8 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 23.

name: Extended Teleportation
html:
Extended Teleportation

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : Whenever you teleport with a swordmage or swordmage paragon path power, add 1 to the distance you can teleport.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 23.

name: Vigor of the Blade Adept
html:
Vigor of the Blade Adept

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : While in a swordmage or swordmage paragon path stance, add your Strength modifier to your healing surge value.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 23.

name: Deadly Immobilization
html:
Deadly Immobilization

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, swordmage
Benefit : Whenever you slow or immobilize a target with a swordmage or swordmage paragon path attack power, that power deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 23.

name: Timely Teleport
html:
Timely Teleport

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, swordmage
Benefit : When you use second wind, you can also teleport a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 23.

name: Awaken God Fragment
html:
Awaken God Fragment

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, invoker
Benefit : The god fragment within you awakens to strengthen your connections to your divine patron and improve the flow of energy into your being. Choose a god fragment that corresponds with the deity you serve. You gain all the fragment’s benefits.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382 , page(s) 57.

name: Improved Speed of Thought
html:
Improved Speed of Thought

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Battlemind, speed of thought power
Benefit : When you use your speed of thought, you can move 2 additional squares.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 181.

name: Pursuing Step
html:
Pursuing Step

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Battlemind, blurred step power
Benefit : When you use blurred step, if you end the shift adjacent to the triggering enemy, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 182.

name: Demand's Reach
html:
Demand's Reach

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, battlemind, battlemind’s demand power
Benefit : The burst of your battlemind’s demand increases to 5.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 187.

name: Linebreaker
html:
Linebreaker

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, battlemind, speed of thought power
Benefit : When you use your speed of thought, you can enter an enemy’s space. Doing so ends the movement. You must then slide the enemy 1 square.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 188.

name: Vengeance Spike
html:
Vengeance Spike

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, battlemind, mind spike power
Benefit : When you damage a target with your mind spike, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against that target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 193.

name: Ape's Reach
html:
Ape's Reach

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Athletics checks.
While you are in beast form and you are bloodied, you gain +1 reach with melee basic attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 37.

name: Beast Form Eyes
html:
Beast Form Eyes

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Perception checks.
While you are in beast form, you gain low-light vision.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 37.

name: Cheetah's Speed
html:
Cheetah's Speed

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form and you are bloodied, you gain a +4 feat bonus to speed when you charge or run.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Constrictor’s Grasp
html:
Constrictor’s Grasp

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to skill checks made when using the escape action.
Whenever a creature you are grabbing while you are in beast form fails an escape attempt to end the grab, it takes damage equal to the higher of your Constitution modifier or Dexterity modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Monkey's Rush
html:
Monkey's Rush

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Athletics checks.
When you bull rush while in beast form, you can slide the target rather than push the target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Shifting Wind
html:
Shifting Wind

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : When you use your second wind while in beast form, you can also shift 2 squares.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Slithering Form
html:
Slithering Form

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : You do not provoke opportunity attacks when crawling while in beast form.
You gain a +2 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Stampede
html:
Stampede

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : After making a charge attack while in beast form, you can move 2 squares as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Turtle's Shell
html:
Turtle's Shell

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Druid, wild shape power
Benefit : While you are in beast form, any time you take the total defense action or use your second wind, you gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 38.

name: Ancient Covenant of Nessus
html:
Ancient Covenant of Nessus

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, invoker, Divine Covenant class feature
Benefit : When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power on your turn, instead of your normal covenant manifestation, you can allow one target of the power to make a basic attack as a free action. If the target makes this attack, it takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier after resolving the attack.

The damage increases to 10 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level and 15 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Blood Pact of Cania
html:
Blood Pact of Cania

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, Cha 13, warlock, Infernal Pact class feature
Benefit : You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with any warlock power that uses Constitution for attack rolls. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Bloodhunter's Dread
html:
Bloodhunter's Dread

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : When you hit a bloodied foe, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Bloodhunter's Flank
html:
Bloodhunter's Flank

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : When you flank a bloodied foe, you and allies you flank with gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against that foe. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Burning Wrath of Phlegethos
html:
Burning Wrath of Phlegethos

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, infernal wrath racial power, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit : If you use infernal wrath against the target of your oath of enmity, your melee attacks against that target deal extra fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Clever Tail
html:
Clever Tail

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : Once per round, you can spend a free action to draw or stow an object weighing up to 1 pound with your tail. This feat does not give you the ability to make attacks with your tail.

You can use your tail to make Thievery checks when your hands are otherwise occupied. Your tail can even use thieves’ tools.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Cloying Shadow of Maladomini
html:
Cloying Shadow of Maladomini

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, warlock, Shadow Walk class feature
Benefit : When an enemy hits you with a melee attack while you have concealment granted by your Shadow Walk, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Hellbook
html:
Hellbook

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, wizard, Spellbook class feature
Benefit : Each time you take an extended rest, choose one daily wizard attack spell that has the fear or fire keyword and that is currently in your spellbook.
As a minor action, you can swap one prepared but uncast daily wizard attack spell for this chosen spell. The level of the uncast spell that you swap out must be equal to or higher than the level of the chosen spell.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 25.

name: Hellish Blast
html:
Hellish Blast

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, warlock, eldritch blast power
Benefit : Whenever you use eldritch blast, you can choose for it to deal fire damage. If you do, it gains the fire keyword and you gain a +1 bonus to the damage roll. The bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Icy Clutch of Stygia
html:
Icy Clutch of Stygia

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : Whenever an enemy successfully saves against ongoing damage that you imposed, that enemy takes cold damage equal to your Charisma or Intelligence modifier.

The cold damage inceases to 5 + your Charisma or Intelligence modifier at 11th level and 10 + your Charisma or Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Infernal Touch of Warding
html:
Infernal Touch of Warding

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, paladin, lay on hands power
Benefit : When you use lay on hands, the target also gains fire resistance equal to 5 + one-half your level until the end of the encounter.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Insatiable Rage of Minauros
html:
Insatiable Rage of Minauros

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, barbarian
Benefit : While you are raging, you gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls, but if you end your turn without dealing damage to an enemy on that turn, you take 2 damage.

The bonus increases to +3 and the damage increases to 3 at 11th level. The bonus increases to +5 and the damage increases to 5 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Psychic Corruption of Malbolge
html:
Psychic Corruption of Malbolge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, any psionic class
Benefit : After you hit an enemy with an augmented psionic power, that enemy gains vulnerability to the fire and the psychic damage of your powers until the end of your next turn. The vulnerability equals 2 and increases to 4 at 11th level and 6 at 21st level.


Update (6/14/2010)
Replace the Benefit entry with the new text.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Stirring Song of Baator
html:
Stirring Song of Baator

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, bard
Benefit : When you hit an enemy with a bard attack that has the fire or fear keyword, one ally who can see you gains temporary hit points equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

The temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level and 5 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Tail Slide
html:
Tail Slide

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : When you shift, you can also slide an ally adjacent to your starting square 1 square.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Flanking Maneuver
html:
Flanking Maneuver

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Dex 17, trained in Acrobatics
Benefit : You can move diagonally even if a wall corner normally blocks such movement.
You can move through enemies’ spaces. You provoke opportunity attacks for this movement as normal. You can’t end your move in an enemy’s space.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 207.

name: Turathi Spirit Companion
html:
Turathi Spirit Companion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, shaman, Companion Spirit class feature
Benefit : When your spirit companion is adjacent to a bloodied enemy, the bonus granted by your Bloodhunt racial trait increases to +2.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Turathi Weapon Training
html:
Turathi Weapon Training

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : You gain proficiency and a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with the khopesh, scourge, sickle, scythe, scimitar, and falchion. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: War Captain of Avernus
html:
War Captain of Avernus

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, warlord, Commanding Presence class feature
Benefit : When an ally you can see spends an action point, the ally gains resistance to fire and resistance to poison equal to 5 + one-half your level until the end of his or her next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 26.

name: Baalzebul’s Desperate Gambit
html:
Baalzebul’s Desperate Gambit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : When you first become bloodied in an encounter, you can roll a saving throw, with a bonus equal to the number of enemies adjacent to you. If you succeed, spend a healing surge. If you fail, you lose a healing surge.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 27.

name: Bel’s Impending Victory
html:
Bel’s Impending Victory

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : When you hit a bloodied enemy, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target until the start of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 27.

name: Blood of Levistus
html:
Blood of Levistus

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : You gain resistance to cold equal to 5 + one-half your level. You gain a +3 feat bonus to damage rolls with attacks that have the cold keyword.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 27.

name: Dispater’s Iron Discipline
html:
Dispater’s Iron Discipline

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to your Will defense.

In addition, when you make a saving throw to end an effect that stuns, dominates, or dazes you, you gain a bonus to your saving throw equal to your Charisma or Intelligence modifier.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 27.

name: Glasya’s Charming Words
html:
Glasya’s Charming Words

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls with powers that have the charm keyword.

When you score a critical hit with a charm power, the target is also dominated until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 27.

name: Hellfire of Mephistopheles
html:
Hellfire of Mephistopheles

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : Each time you hit an enemy that has fire resistance, after resolving the attack, reduce the value of the resistance by 5 until the end of the encounter.


Update (6/14/2010)
In the Benefit entry, delete the second sentence.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 27.

name: Mammon’s Theft of Health
html:
Mammon’s Theft of Health

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you can choose for an ally within 5 squares of you to lose a healing surge. If you do, you regain extra hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 28.

name: Secrets of Belial
html:
Secrets of Belial

Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling
Benefit : Choose a class that you don’t already belong to. You can swap one utility power you know for one utility power of the same level or lower from the chosen class.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 28.

name: Tail Trip
html:
Tail Trip

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : When you hit an enemy with an opportunity attack or an attack granted by your Combat Challenge, you can knock the target prone.


Update (9/10/2010)
Add “11th level” as a prerequisite.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 28.

name: Hellfire Teleport
html:
Hellfire Teleport

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, tiefling
Benefit : Once per turn, when you teleport, you deal 5 + your Charisma or Intelligence modifier fire damage to each enemy in or adjacent to the square you leave.


Update (6/14/2010)
In the Benefit entry, replace “When” with “Once per turn, when.”

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 28.

name: Hell’s Burning Mark
html:
Hell’s Burning Mark

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, tiefling
Benefit : While a creature is marked by you, it has vulnerable 5 fire against your attack powers.


Update (6/14/2010)
Replace the Benefit entry with the following text: “While a creature is marked by you, it has vulnerable 5 fire against your attack powers.”

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 28.

name: Renewed Wrath
html:
Renewed Wrath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, tiefling
Benefit : Whenever you use your second wind or spend an action point, you regain the use of your infernal wrath.

name: Royal Command of Asmodeus
html:

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, tiefling
Benefit : Whenever you stun an enemy, you can choose to dominate the enemy for the same duration instead of stunning it.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling , page(s) 28.

name: Ancestral Wrath [Dwarven Bloodline]
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Forgeborn Heritage
Benefit : While you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to speed.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

name: Forgeborn Heritage [Dwarven Bloodline]Elemental Legacy
html:
Forgeborn Heritage [Dwarven Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf
Benefit : You gain the elemental legacy power. You also gain resist 2 to acid, cold, fire, and lightning damage. This resistance increases to 3 at 11th level and 5 at 21st level.


Feat Utility Elemental Legacy

You allow the hated elemental energy in your soul to swell forth and scour your foes.

Encounter Acid , Cold , Fire or Lightning
Free Action Personal

Trigger : You hit an enemy with an attack

Effect : Your attack deals 3 extra acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage to the enemy.
Level 11: This attack deals 6 extra damage.
Level 21: This attack deals 9 extra damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

name: Iron Hide Resilience
html:
Iron Hide Resilience

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Forgeborn Heritage
Benefit : Increase the resistance you gain from Forgeborn Heritage to 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 11th level and to 15 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

name: Keen Hatred
html:
Keen Hatred

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Forgeborn Heritage
Benefit : When you use elemental legacy, you also gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

name: Wrathful Legacy
html:
Wrathful Legacy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Forgeborn Heritage
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied in each encounter, you regain the use of elemental legacy.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

name: Improved Legacy
html:
Improved Legacy

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Forgeborn Heritage
Benefit : Increase the extra damage you deal with elemental legacy by 4. At 21st level, it instead increases by 6.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

name: Wrathful Resurgence
html:

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Forgeborn Heritage
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you also gain temporary hit points equal to half your healing surge value.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 75.

When you hit an enemy and at least one other enemy is providing it with cover from your attack, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier to one enemy providing cover to it.
You can use a power associated with this feat in place of a ranged basic attack.

name: Weapon Focus
html:
Weapon Focus

Benefit : Choose a weapon group, such as spear or heavy blade. You gain a +1 feat bonus to the damage rolls of weapon attacks that you make with a weapon from that group. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another weapon group.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter or warlord; proficiency with any two-handed axe, two-handed hammer, or two-handed pick
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.
When you are attacking with a two-handed axe, a two-handed hammer, or a two-handed pick and you have proficiency with that weapon, you also gain the following benefit.
When you hit an enemy with a power associated with this feat, the enemy takes a –1 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.


Associated Powers: Crushing Surge , Furious Smash

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 121.

name: Moradin's Forge Champion [Greater Style]
html:
Moradin's Forge Champion [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, Moradin’s Forge Student feat
Benefit : When you are attacking with a two-handed axe, a two-handed hammer, or a two-handed pick and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.
You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn against any attack that would immobilize, restrain, or slow you.
You can use a power associated with this feat in place of a melee basic attack when making an attack as a result of your Combat Challenge class feature.


Associated Powers: Adamantine Strike , Appalling Crunch , Crushing Blow , Exacting Strike , Griffon's Wrath , Harrowing Hammer

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 121.

When you attack an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you can target the enemy’s Fortitude instead of AC.

Whenever you hit an enemy with a martial power, that enemy takes a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn against effects that daze or stun.
When you attack with a power associated with this feat, you can shift 2 squares before the attack as a free action.

In the Prerequisite entry, at “, proficiency with chainmail” to the end of the list of prerequisites.

At the end of the feat’s Benefit entry, add “or grabbing a creature.”

While your beast companion acts independently, it need not move adjacent to you but must remain within 10 squares of you.
In addition, if it hits a creature with a melee basic attack, that creature is also immobilized until the end of the creature’s next turn.

name: Crushing Mace

Benefit : When you hit a creature marked by you with a melee attack, you can use your darkfire against that creature as a free action. Using darkfire in this way doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

name: Deadeye Slinger

name: Dragonclaw Mark

name: Eladrin's Challenge

In the Prerequisite entry, replace “earthshock, firepulse, or promise of storm” with “earthshock or firepulse.” In the Benefit entry, replace the first comma with “or” and delete “, or promise of storm.”

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 133.

name: Fearless Seeker

name: Learn by Doing

Benefit : When you use a warlord power to grant an ally a basic attack and that attack misses a creature, the ally gains a +2 bonus to his or her next attack roll against that creature before the end of his or her next turn.

name: Spear Mastery

Prerequisite : Str 13 or Cha 13

If the ally chooses to use the bonus, he or she grants combat advantage to the target of the attack until the end of his or her next turn. This bonus increases to +6 at 11th level and +8 at 21st level.

Prerequisite : Str 13 or Wis 13

Once per encounter while you wield a weapon in one hand and have nothing in your other hand, you can use a free action during your turn to gain a +1 bonus to an attack roll you just made or a +1 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

name: Cyclone Warrior [Multiclass Fighter]

Prerequisite : Str 13 or Dex 13

name: Insightful Leader [Multiclass Warlord]

Benefit : You gain training in one skill from the warlord’s class skills list.
When an ally you can see spends an action point to make an attack, the ally gains a +3 bonus to damage rolls on a hit or gains 3 temporary hit points on a miss. This bonus increases to +5 at 11th level and +7 at 21st level. These temporary hit points increase to 5 at 11th level and 7 at 21st level.

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 146.

name: Skirmishing Leader [Multiclass Warlord]
html:

name: Pick Mastery
html:

name: Font of Chaos
html:

Prerequisite : Warden, Font of Life class feature

name: Roiling Storm

name: Storm Manifested
html:

Prerequisite : Genasi, warden, promise of storm power

name: Storm's Lightning
html:
Storm's Lightning

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warden, Stormheart class feature
Benefit : When you use your second wind, each enemy marked by you takes lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

name: Untamed Fire

name: Gusting Rebuke
html:

Prerequisite : 11th level, warden, Stormheart class feature
Benefit : When enemy adjacent to you that is marked by you hits and damages one of your allies with an attack that does not include you as a target, you can push the enemy a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier as an immediate reaction.

name: Mountain's Wrath
html:
Mountain's Wrath

Prerequisite : 21st level, warden, Nature’s Wrath class feature

name: Bard of All Trades
html:

name: Saving Breath
html:

Benefit : When you use majestic word, the target gains a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier to the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.

name: Battle Hardened
html:

Heroic Tier
Benefit : You gain a +5 feat bonus to saving throws against fear effects. In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to initiative checks.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 177.

name: Battle Caster Defense
html:
Battle Caster Defense

Heroic Tier
Benefit : You gain a +4 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks that you provoke when using a ranged or an area power.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 177.

name: Battering Shield
html:
Battering Shield

Prerequisite : Proficiency with heavy shields
Benefit : When you are wielding a heavy shield and push or slide a target with a melee attack, you can move that target 1 additional square.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 177.

name: Bloodied Ferocity
html:

Prerequisite : Minotaur
Benefit : The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action. If you do so, you grant combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 177.

name: Die Hard
html:

Prerequisite : Con 13, human
Benefit : When you have failed two death saving throws since your last rest, you gain a +5 feat bonus to death saving throws and can spend a healing surge on a result of 15 or higher. If you have no healing surges, your condition does not change.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 67.

name: Don't Count Me Out
html:
Don't Count Me Out

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human
Benefit : While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws against effects that immobilize, daze, stun, or weaken you. Increase this bonus to +3 if you have the Human Perseverance feat.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 67.

name: Frantic Recovery
html:
Frantic Recovery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human
Benefit : When you spend an action point to gain an extra action, until the end of your turn, you can use your second wind as a minor action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 67.

name: Pain Doesn't Hurt
html:

Prerequisite : 11th level, human
Benefit : While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage. Increase this bonus to +3 if you have the Human Perseverance feat. In addition, the first time you are bloodied in each encounter, you ignore all ongoing damage until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 67.

name: Persistent Threat
html:
Persistent Threat

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, human
Benefit : While you are dazed, you can still flank enemies, and you can take an opportunity action if you haven’t taken one since the start of your last turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 67.

name: Perfect Recovery
html:
Perfect Recovery

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, human
Benefit : When you spend an action point to take an extra action, end one effect on you that a save can end.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 67.

name: Bane's Tyrannical Transference [Divinity]Bane's Tyrannical Transference
html:
Bane's Tyrannical Transference [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Bane
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Bane’s tyrannical transference.


Feat Utility Bane's Tyrannical Transference

You call on Bane to transfer a hindrance to another—someone better suited to endure its consequences.

Encounter Divine
Immediate Interrupt Close burst 5

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.

Trigger : You or an ally within range becomes dazed, immobilized, stunned, or slowed

Effect : You transfer that effect to you or to another ally within the burst.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 68.

name: Progress of Erathis [Divinity]Progress of Erathis
html:
Progress of Erathis [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Erathis
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use progress of Erathis.


Feat Utility Progress of Erathis

With this quick prayer to Erathis, you call your allies to move forward though the wilderness.

Encounter Divine
Minor Action Close burst 5

Channel Divinity : You can use only one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

Target : You and each ally in the burst

Effect : The target ignores difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 69.

name: Mantle of Misfortune [Tiefling Bloodline]Mantle of Misfortune
html:
Mantle of Misfortune [Tiefling Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : You gain mantle of misfortune as an encounter power. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to Insight and Perception checks made against other tieflings.


Feat Utility Mantle of Misfortune

While the enemy remains near you, its feet slip, it drops things, and nothing goes right.

Encounter
Minor Action Personal

Effect : Until the end of your next turn, enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls while within 5 squares of you and each time an enemy within 5 squares of you misses with an attack you can slide the target 1 square as a free action.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 71.

name: Accidental Tells [Tiefling Bloodline]

Accidental Tells [Tiefling Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, Mantle of Misfortune feat
Benefit : When you make an Insight check against a creature within range of your active mantle of misfortune power, you can roll twice and take the better result.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383 , page(s) 71.

name: Guardian's Mishaps [Tiefling Bloodline]

Guardian's Mishaps [Tiefling Bloodline]

Level Extra Damage (Two-Handed Weapon)

name: Centered Master
html:

Prerequisite : 21st level, monk, centered flurry of blows power
Benefit : Your centered flurry of blows can slide each target 2 squares, instead of 1.

name: Champion of Nature
html:

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, wilden, Nature’s Aspect racial trait
Benefit : Whenever you reach a milestone, choose an aspect of nature available to you but that you aren’t manifesting. You can use that aspect’s racial power as well as the power of your current aspect. You can’t use this feat to choose the same aspect more than once before your next extended rest.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Clarifying Presence
html:

Benefit : When any ally within your telepathy range makes a saving throw against an effect that dazes or stuns, he or she can roll twice and use either result.

name: Cleaving Axe
html:

Prerequisite : 21st level
Benefit : Once per round when you reduce any enemy to 0 hit points with an axe, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action.

name: Deft Aim
html:

Epic Tier

Benefit : Whenever you use a bow or a crossbow to make a ranged basic attack against AC, you can make the attack against Reflex instead.

name: Endangering Outrage
html:

Epic Tier

name: Long Step

Prerequisite : 21st level
Benefit : Whenever you shift, you can shift 1 additional square.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Mythic Senses

Benefit : When you roll initiative, you can substitute a Perception check for your initiative check.

Published in Player's Handbook 3 , page(s) 190.

name: Psychic Bastion

Once per day, you can use the ardent’s ardent surge power.

html:

html:

name: Student of Divine Runes [Multiclass Runepriest]
html:

html:

name: Psionic Dabbler [Multiclass Encounter]
html:

You can use that power once per encounter. You gain a number of power points based on the level of the at-will attack power: level 1-10, 2 power points; level 11-20, 4 power points; and level 21-30, 6 power points.

name: Chilling Presence
html:

name: Long Jumper
html:

name: Winterkin Heritage [Eladrin Bloodline]Winter's Shroud
html:
Winterkin Heritage [Eladrin Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin
Benefit : You gain the winter’s shroud power. In addition, you gain resist cold equal to 5 + one-half your level.


Feat Utility Winter's Shroud

When the enemy’s attack falls, snow swirls around you to whisk you to safety.

Encounter Teleportation
Immediate Reaction Personal

Trigger : An enemy damages you with an attack

Effect : You teleport 3 squares and gain concealment until the start of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384 , page(s) 64.

name: Winter's Reach
html:
Winter's Reach

Prerequisite : Winterkin Heritage
Benefit : When you use winter’s shroud, increase the distance you teleport by a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier or your Intelligence modifier.

name: Winter's Heart
html:
Winter's Heart

Benefit : While you are not bloodied, any enemy that hits you with a melee attack is slowed until the end of its turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 384 , page(s) 64.

html:

When you are attacking with a heavy blade that has the high crit property and you have proficiency with that weapon, you can shift 2 squares before your attack as a free action when you use a power associated with this feat.


Associated Powers: Avalanche of Fury , Jackal Ploy , Nimble Defense , Shadow Wasp Strike , Two-Weapon Eviscerate , Unstable Gash

name: Desert Moon Swordmaster [Greater Style]
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, Desert Moon Student feat
Benefit : When you are wielding a heavy blade that has the high crit property and you have proficiency with that weapon, you can shift 1 square as an immediate reaction when an enemy misses you with a melee attack.

When you are attacking with a heavy blade that has the high crit property and you have proficiency with that weapon, you can use a power associated with this feat in place of a melee basic attack when making an attack as a result of your Combat Challenge class feature.


Associated Powers: Adamantine Strike , Dance of Steel , Fangs of Steel , Harrying Assault , Storm of Blows , Sudden Surge

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 114.

Allies adjacent to you gain a +2 feat bonus to AC and Reflex against attacks from enemies adjacent to you.
You can use a power associated with this feat in place of a melee basic attack when making an opportunity attack.


Associated Powers: Blood Begets Blood , Bolstering Blow , Girding Strike , Sacrificial Lure , Warlord's Doom , Warlord's Strike

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 125.

You gain combat advantage until the end of your next turn against any enemy you push.
When you hit an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you can push the enemy 2 squares.


Associated Powers: Great Dragon War Cry , Hold the Line , Into the Breach! , Resourceful Triumph , Signal the Charge , Stirring Force

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 126.

Whenever you score a critical hit against an enemy, you also knock that enemy prone, and the first time it stands up before the end of your next turn, it provokes an opportunity attack.
You can use Strength instead of Dexterity for attack rolls and damage rolls when using a power associated with this feat.


Associated Powers: Arrow of Vengeance ,
Bloodlust Strike : Only when used as a ranged attack
Hawk's Talon : Only when used as a ranged attack Hobbling Shot , Lightning Shot , Thwarting Shot

Whenever you score a critical hit against an enemy, you also knock that enemy prone, and the first time it stands up before the end of your next turn, it provokes an opportunity attack.

name: Steel Vanguard Soldier [Greater Style]

When attacking with a power associated with this feat, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

Published in Martial Power 2 , page(s) 130.

name: Steel Vanguard Captain [Greater Style]
html:

Benefit : When you are attacking with a two-handed heavy blade and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following benefit.
When attacking with a power associated with this feat, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

In the table, replace phalanx assault with fierce reply, and change the page number to 88.

name: Improved Initiative
html:

Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

name: Telepathic Sustenance

name: Psionic Conventionalist [Multiclass Encounter]
html:

Benefit : You can swap one of your augmentable at-will attack powers for an encounter attack power of the same level or lower from the class you multiclassed into. You lose a number of power points based on the level of the at-will attack power: level 1–10, 2 power points; level 11–20, 4 power points; and level 21–30, 6 power points.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 208.

name: Godsworn Avalanche
html:

Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Religion checks. In addition, whenever you score a critical hit, you can also push the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier as a godsworn boon. name: Godsworn Bulwark
html:
Godsworn Bulwark

Prerequisite : Avenger, must worship Moradin
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Religion checks. In addition, whenever you score a critical hit, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn as a godsworn boon. You can benefit from only one godsworn boon as a result of any given critical hit.

name: Godsworn Defender

name: Godsworn Fatalist
