Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls that you make with a crossbow or a wand. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
You can also draw or stow a wand once per round as a free action on your turn, and you can load a crossbow as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine 402 .

name: Battle Song Expertise
html:
Battle Song Expertise

Prerequisite : Bard
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls you make with any weapon with which you have proficiency and with a wand or another item designated as a bard implement. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
You also gain a +1 feat bonus to the number of squares that you can pull, push, or slide creatures with your bard attacks and bard paragon path attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 402 .

name: Devout Protector Expertise
html:
Devout Protector Expertise

Prerequisite : Proficiency with holy symbols
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to weapon attack rolls you make with any one-handed melee weapon and a +1 feat bonus to implement attack rolls you make with holy symbols. These bonuses increase to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
In addition, while you use a shield, your allies gain a +1 shield bonus to AC.

Published in Dragon Magazine 402 .

name: Mighty Crusader Expertise
html:
Mighty Crusader Expertise

Prerequisite : Proficiency with holy symbols
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to weapon attack rolls you make with any two-handed melee weapon and a +1 feat bonus to implement attack rolls you make with holy symbols. These bonuses increase to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
In addition, while you wield a two-handed melee weapon, ranged and area attacks you make with a holy symbol do not provoke opportunity attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 402 .

name: War Wizard's Expertise
html:
War Wizard's Expertise

Prerequisite : Any arcane class
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to the attack rolls of arcane powers and basic attacks that you make with a light blade or a heavy blade. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
Also, when you use an arcane attack power with a light blade or a heavy blade, your attack rolls take a –5 penalty against your allies.

Published in Dragon Magazine 402 .

name: Ankle Biter
html:
Ankle Biter

Prerequisite : Goblin race
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls against creatures larger than you. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and to +3 at 21st level.
Also, when you score a critical hit against a creature larger than you, the creature takes 1d6 extra damage.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 38.

name: Desperate Goblin Tactics
html:
Desperate Goblin Tactics

Prerequisite : Goblin race, goblin tactics racial power
Benefit : When you use goblin tactics while bloodied, you can shift up to 2 extra squares.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 38.

name: Goblin Feint
html:
Goblin Feint

Prerequisite : Goblin race, goblin tactics racial power
Benefit : When you use goblin tactics, you gain combat advantage against the enemy that missed you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 38.

name: Shadowcreeper
html:
Shadowcreeper

Prerequisite : Goblin race, assassin, goblin tactics racial power
Benefit : When you use goblin tactics, you can shift 1 extra square, and you gain partial concealment until the end of your next turn.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 38.

name: Sneaky Stabber
html:
Sneaky Stabber

Prerequisite : Goblin race, rogue, Sneak Attack feature
Benefit : When you deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature adjacent to you, you can reroll any Sneak Attack damage die that results in a 1 until it no longer results in a 1.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 38.

name: Wrist Biter
html:
Wrist Biter

Prerequisite : Goblin race, goblin tactics racial power
Benefit : When you use goblin tactics in response to an adjacent enemy’s attack, the enemy takes 1d4 damage right before you shift. This damage increases to 2d4 at 11th level and 3d4 at 21st level.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 38.

name: Dragon’s Indomitability
html:
Dragon’s Indomitability

Prerequisite : Kobold
Benefit : You can roll two dice and use either result when making saving throws against effects that daze or stun you.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 44.

name: Eldritch Momentum
html:
Eldritch Momentum

Prerequisite : Kobold, warlock, Warlock’s Curse class feature
Benefit : If you move at least 3 squares away from where you started your turn, you gain combat advantage until the start of your next turn against creatures subject to your Warlock’s Curse.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 44.

name: Kobold in a Corner
html:
Kobold in a Corner

Prerequisite : Kobold
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against creatures that have combat advantage against you. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 44.

name: Shiftier Maneuver
html:
Shiftier Maneuver

Prerequisite : Kobold, shifty maneuver racial power
Benefit : When you use shifty maneuver, one target of the power can shift up to 2 extra squares.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 44.

name: Trapbuster
html:
Trapbuster

Prerequisite : Kobold, training in Thievery
Benefit : You can roll two dice and use either result when you make a Perception check to detect a trap. In addition, you never trigger a trap when you fail a Thievery check to disable it.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 44.

name: Crew Savvy
html:
Crew Savvy

Prerequisite : Svirfneblin, training in Athletics
Benefit : You gain a +3 feat bonus to Athletics checks to climb. In addition, whenever you make a Dungeoneering check or an Athletics check to climb, one ally adjacent to you gains a +2 feat bonus the next time he or she makes the same sort of check before the end of your next turn.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 49.

name: Deep Durability
html:
Deep Durability

Prerequisite : Svirfneblin, warden, stone camouflage racial power
Benefit : When you use stone camouflage, you gain 3 additional temporary hit points for each enemy marked by you. The additional temporary hit points per enemy increase to 5 at 11th level and 7 at 21st level.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 49.

name: Deepstone Blessing
html:
Deepstone Blessing

Prerequisite : Svirfneblin, cleric, healing word power
Benefit : When you use healing word, the target also gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 50.

name: Fade to Gray
html:
Fade to Gray

Prerequisite : Svirfneblin, stone camouflage racial power
Benefit : When an attack hits you while you have partial concealment from stone camouflage, you can become invisible until the end of your next turn or until you attack.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 50.

name: Haunted
html:
Haunted

Prerequisite : 21st level
Benefit : When you make a Perception check or an Insight check, you can roll twice and use either result.

Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook , page(s) 102.

name: Improved Flock Tactics
html:
Improved Flock Tactics

Prerequisite : Kenku, flock tactics racial power
Benefit : When your flock tactics power causes an enemy to grant combat advantage to you, you also gain a +3 feat bonus to damage rolls against that enemy until the start of your next turn. When you use your flock tactics power to take the aid attack action, your ally also gains combat advantage on his or her next attack against the chosen enemy.


Update (7/2/2012)
Changed in June 2012 updates.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Kenku Ventriloquist
html:
Kenku Ventriloquist

Prerequisite : Kenku, trained in Bluff
Benefit : When you speak or use your Mimicry racial feature, you can make the sound seem to originate from a square within 5 squares of you. You must succeed on a Bluff check to fool listeners into believing the sound came from that location. If the square is occupied by a creature, that creature knows it didn’t make the sound, and you take a -2 penalty to the Bluff check against other listeners.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Antennae
html:
Thri-Kreen Antennae

Prerequisite : Thri-kreen race
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to Perception checks and Insight checks. You also have blindsight 1. Further, you always know what direction you are facing.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Scuttler
html:
Thri-Kreen Scuttler

Prerequisite : Thri-kreen race
Benefit : When you take the crawl action, you can move at full speed instead of half speed.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Scuttling Master
html:
Thri-Kreen Scuttling Master

Prerequisite : 11th level, Thri-Kreen Scuttler feat
Benefit : You can shift while prone. While you are prone, you do not take the -5 penalty to Stealth checks for moving more than 2 squares.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Shooter
html:
Thri-Kreen Shooter

Prerequisite : Thri-kreen race, proficiency with hand crossbow
Benefit : While you wield a melee weapon using your upper limbs, you can use a hand crossbow wielded with your middle limbs to make ranged attacks. Ranged attacks you make in this way do not provoke opportunity attacks.


Update (7/2/2012)
Changed in June 2012 updates.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Thrower
html:
Thri-Kreen Thrower

Prerequisite : Thri-kreen race, proficiency with a light thrown weapon
Benefit : While you wield a melee weapon in your upper limbs, you can use light thrown weapons wielded in your middle limbs to make ranged attacks. Ranged attacks you make in this way do not provoke opportunity attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Weapon Master
html:
Thri-Kreen Weapon Master

Prerequisite : Thri-kreen race
Benefit : You gain proficiency with the gythka and the chatkcha. Additionally, you gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with these weapons. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Thri-Kreen Wild Talent
html:
Thri-Kreen Wild Talent

Prerequisite : Thri-kreen race, Psionic Augmentation class feature, thri-kreen claws racial power
Benefit : You gain one wild talent cantrip of your choice. Additionally, once per encounter, you can lose a use of your thri-kreen claws power as a minor action to regain 1 power point.

Published in Dragon Magazine 411 .

name: Trap Sense
html:
Trap Sense

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wis 13, rogue
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to all defenses against attacks by traps and to Perception checks to find traps.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 140.

name: Chauntea's Comfort
html:
Chauntea's Comfort

Prerequisite : Must worship Chauntea
Benefit : When you use a power that allows an ally to spend a healing surge to regain hit points, you can lose a healing surge on that ally’s behalf, so the ally benefits from the healing but does not spend a healing surge.

Published in Dragon Magazine 412 .

name: Great Mother's Step [Divinity]Great Mother's Step
html:
Great Mother's Step [Divinity]

Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Chauntea
Benefit : You gain the Great Mother’s step power.


Feat Utility Great Mother's Step

Chauntea’s lessons of unity guide your allies along their way.

Encounter Channel Divinity , Divine , Teleportation
Move Action Close burst 1

Target : You and one ally in burst

Effect : Each target can shift up to 5 squares. If this movement can start and end adjacent to a plant that is Large or larger, the target can teleport instead of shifting.

Special : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.


Published in Dragon Magazine 412 .

name: Firefoe of Silvanus
html:
Firefoe of Silvanus

Prerequisite : Must worship Silvanus
Benefit : You gain resist 5 fire. This resistance increases to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level. If you already have fire resistance, it instead increases by 5.
In addition, against fire creatures, your divine attack powers and primal attack powers deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 412 .

name: Forest Father's Fangs
html:
Forest Father's Fangs

Prerequisite : Must worship Silvanus
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with beast attack powers and beast form attack powers. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 412 .

name: Mother's Bloom
html:
Mother's Bloom

Prerequisite : 2nd level, must worship Chauntea
Benefit : You master the Bloom ritual. You can perform the Bloom ritual in 5 minutes, including during a short rest, and you need no ritual book to do so. Performing the ritual during a short rest does not prevent you from resting. If a creature in the ritual’s affected area spends healing surges at the end of the rest, that creature regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier with each healing surge.
In addition, you can perform the Bloom ritual once per day without expending ritual components.

Published in Dragon Magazine 412 .

name: Forest Father's Grasp [Divinity]Forest Father's Grasp
html:
Forest Father's Grasp [Divinity]

Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Silvanus
Benefit : You gain the Forest Father’s grasp power.


Feat Attack Forest Father's Grasp

Spectral vines envelop your target in a spiritual echo of primeval forests.

Encounter Channel Divinity , Divine
Free Action Special

Trigger : You hit a creature with a divine attack power or a primal attack power.

Effect : The creature you hit falls prone, and it is slowed (save ends).

Special : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.


Published in Dragon Magazine 412 .

name: Goblinoid Mount Training
html:
Goblinoid Mount Training

Prerequisite : Goblin or hobgoblin
Benefit : When you ride a friendly mount, the creature can use your defenses in place of its own (not including any temporary bonuses or penalties).
In addition, the mount can make Acrobatics, Athletics, Endurance, or Stealth checks using your modifier (not including any temporary bonuses or penalties) in place of its own.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Hobgoblin Beast Companion
html:
Hobgoblin Beast Companion

Prerequisite : Hobgoblin, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature, hobgoblin discipline racial power
Benefit : When you use hobgoblin discipline and your beast companion is adjacent to you, you can also end one effect a save can end affecting your beast companion.
In addition, your beast companion gains a +1 feat bonus to all defenses while it is adjacent to you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Hobgoblin Phalanx Soldier
html:
Hobgoblin Phalanx Soldier

Prerequisite : Strength 13, hobgoblin
Benefit : You gain proficiency with all shields.
In addition, you ignore the check penalty for wearing a shield.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Cull the Weak
html:
Cull the Weak

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Cha 15, rogue
Benefit : When you have combat advantage against a bloodied or a weakened target, you gain a +2 bonus to melee weapon damage rolls against the target.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 141.

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Training
html:
Hobgoblin Weapon Training

Prerequisite : Hobgoblin
Benefit : You gain proficiency with all flails and spears.
In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to the damage rolls of weapon attacks that you make using flails and spears. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Phalanx Advance
html:
Phalanx Advance

Prerequisite : Hobgoblin, bard, Virtue of Valor class feature
Benefit : When you use your Virtue of Valor class feature, you and each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free action. Your allies must end the shift in a square adjacent to you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Warcaster Tactics
html:
Warcaster Tactics

Prerequisite : Hobgoblin, any arcane class
Benefit : You can omit one square adjacent to you from the area of effect of any arcane close blast or burst power you use.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Warrior's Sacrifice
html:
Warrior's Sacrifice

Prerequisite : Hobgoblin, hobgoblin discipline racial power
Benefit : As a free action on your turn, you can expend your hobgoblin discipline power to allow an ally adjacent to you to make a saving throw.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Bladed Fists
html:
Bladed Fists

Prerequisite : Bladeling
Benefit : Your unarmed attack deals 1d6 damage. In addition, you gain a +2 proficiency bonus to attack rolls you make with unarmed attacks.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Bladed Stalker
html:
Bladed Stalker

Prerequisite : Bladeling, Bladed Fists feat
Benefit : Your unarmed attack gains the high crit weapon property.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Brutal Blades
html:
Brutal Blades

Prerequisite : Bladeling, razor storm racial power
Benefit : Your unarmed attack gains the off-hand weapon property.
In addition, the damage dice for your razor storm power increase from d6s to d8s.

Published in Dragon Magazine 419 .

name: Bozak Evoker
html:
Bozak Evoker

Prerequisite : Bozak draconian, Arcane Blood racial feature, Concussive Vengeance racial feature
Benefit : If you score a critical hit with an arcane attack power, the target falls prone. In addition, while you are bloodied, you double your racial bonus to damage rolls with arcane attack powers.

Published in Dragon Magazine 421 .

name: Draconian Wings
html:
Draconian Wings

Prerequisite : Bozak or kapak draconian, Instinctive Flight racial feature
Benefit : You ignore the speed penalty for wearing heavy armor, and your altitude limit for Instinctive Flight increases to 2.

Published in Dragon Magazine 421 .

name: Kapak Resistance
html:
Kapak Resistance

Prerequisite : Kapak draconian, Caustic Heritage racial feature
Benefit : You gain resist 5 acid and resist 5 poison. This benefit increases to resist 10 acid and resist 10 poison at 11th level, and resist 15 acid and resist 15 poison at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 421 .

name: Epic Recovery
html:
Epic Recovery

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Con 19, any martial class
Benefit : You can use your second wind twice per encounter.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 147.

name: Improved Lab Conditioning
html:
Improved Lab Conditioning

Prerequisite : Tinker gnome, lab conditioning racial power
Benefit : When you use your lab conditioning racial power, you can also make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

Published in Dragon Magazine 422 .

name: Inventive Empowerment
html:
Inventive Empowerment

Prerequisite : Tinker gnome, artificer, Arcane Empowerment class feature
Benefit : You gain one additional use of the Arcane Empowerment class feature per day.

Published in Dragon Magazine 422 .

name: Mage Hand Assistant
html:
Mage Hand Assistant

Prerequisite : Tinker gnome, wizard, mage hand cantrip
Benefit : You can use the mage hand cantrip to perform Arcana checks made to manipulate magical phenomena, or Thievery checks made to disable devices, open locks, or pick pockets. Both kinds of checks can be made from up to 5 squares away from the target of the check.

Published in Dragon Magazine 422 .

name: Quick Tinker
html:
Quick Tinker

Prerequisite : Tinker gnome, Quick Fix racial feature, trained in Arcana or Thievery
Benefit : You ignore the -4 penalty for using your Quick Fix racial feature.
In addition, if you have the jury rig power, you can choose two targets instead of one whenever you use it.

Published in Dragon Magazine 422 .

name: Reaper's Blade
html:
Reaper's Blade

Prerequisite : Must worship Nerull
Benefit : You gain proficiency and a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with the sickle and the scythe. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level. In addition, you treat the scythe as having the high crit property.

Published in Dragon Magazine 427 .

name: Nerull's Binding [Divinity]Nerull's Binding
html:
Nerull's Binding [Divinity]

Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Nerull
Benefit : You gain the power Nerull’s binding.


Feat Utility Nerull's Binding

The shade of a dead enemy provides you with a dark veil of temporary protection.

Encounter Aura , Channel Divinity , Divine , Necrotic
Immediate Reaction Personal

Trigger : You drop an enemy below 1 hit point, or an enemy adjacent to you drops below 1 hit point.

Effect : You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of your next turn. You have partial concealment against enemies in the aura. Any creature that makes a melee attack against you or ends its turn in the aura takes necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Special : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.


Published in Dragon Magazine 427 .

name: Inspiring Fury
html:
Inspiring Fury

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-orc, Skald’s Aura class feature
Benefit : When you use your furious assault racial power, any creature that heals using your Skald’s Aura class feature before the end of your next turn gains additional hit points equal to 1d8 + your Charisma modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 429 .

name: Feral Companion
html:
Feral Companion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-orc, combined attack druid attack power
Benefit : You can use your furious assault power after you hit with your combined attack power’s attack and your animal companion hits with the animal attack combined attack’s effect allows. If you do, your hit and your animal companion’s hit both deal the extra damage from your furious assault power.

Published in Dragon Magazine 429 .

name: Unyielding Rage
html:
Unyielding Rage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-orc, Rage Strike class feature
Benefit : When you use your furious assault power with your rage strike power’s attack, you do not expend furious assault.

Published in Dragon Magazine 429 .

name: Grit
html:
Grit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Con 17, fighter
Benefit : When you spend a healing surge to regain hit points, you also gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 143.

name: Adaptable Breath
html:
Adaptable Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit : Choose a type of damage your dragon breath doesn’t already deal from among acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.
When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to use this damage type rather than the normal damage dealt by the power. Only one damage type applies for a given dragon breath attack.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another damage type for your dragon breath power that you don’t already have for it.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 22, Dragon Magazine 365 , page(s) 28.

name: Fey Charge
html:
Fey Charge

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, eladrin, fighter
Benefit : When you charge, you can expend your fey step racial power as a free action to replace up to 5 squares of your charge movement with teleportation.
If the charge attack hits, you do not expend fey step.


Update (4/9/2010)
In the first sentence of the Benefit entry, replace “use” with “expend.”

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 143.

name: Avandra's Gift
html:
Avandra's Gift

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, halfling, rogue
Benefit : When you use your second chance racial power and the enemy’s attack misses, you gain combat advantage for the next attack roll you make against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 140.

name: Speed Loader
html:
Speed Loader

Benefit : As a free action, you can reload a crossbow you’re wielding that has the load minor weapon property.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 189, Heroes of the Fallen Lands , page(s) 317, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms , page(s) 318.

name: Defensive Advantage
html:
Defensive Advantage

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Dex 17
Benefit : When you have combat advantage against an enemy, you gain a +2 bonus to AC against that enemy’s attacks.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Reckless Attacker
html:
Reckless Attacker

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, fighter
Benefit : The first time you score a critical hit with a fighter attack power on your turn, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action. If you do so, you take a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.


Revision (10/13/2009)
Replace the first sentence of the Benefit entry with the following: “The first time you score a critical hit with a fighter attack power on your turn, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action.”

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 144.

name: Halfling Stalwart
html:
Halfling Stalwart

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, fighter
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against Large or larger creatures marked by you.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Marked Scourge
html:
Marked Scourge

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : Once per round, you can add your Wisdom modifier to your damage roll against an enemy marked by you.


Revision (2/26/2009)
Replace the text on the Benefit line with the following: “Once per round, you can add your Wisdom modifier to your damage roll against an enemy marked by you.”

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 144.

name: Victor's Confidence
html:
Victor's Confidence

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 15, fighter
Benefit : When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a melee attack, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 140.

name: Dirty Fighting
html:
Dirty Fighting

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter or rogue
Benefit : You gain a +4 bonus to melee weapon damage rolls against surprised enemies.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Surprising Charge
html:
Surprising Charge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dex 17, fighter or rogue
Benefit : When you make a charge attack against a target that is granting combat advantage to you, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage if you hit with a light blade or a spear.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 139.

name: Fey Gambit
html:
Fey Gambit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, eladrin, rogue
Benefit : When you use your fey step racial power to move adjacent to an enemy, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your turn.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 143.

name: Improved Bull Rush
html:
Improved Bull Rush

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Str 13, Con 13
Benefit : When you use the bull rush action, you gain a +4 feat bonus to the attack roll. The bonus increases to +6 at 11th level and +8 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 185.

name: Battle Instructor [Multiclass Warlord]
html:
Battle Instructor [Multiclass Warlord]

Prerequisite : Any multiclass warlord feat, paragon multiclassing as a warlord
Benefit : You gain the warlord’s Combat Leader class feature.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 149.

name: Cursed Advantage
html:
Cursed Advantage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, warlock, Warlock’s Curse class feature
Benefit : You gain combat advantage against bloodied enemies cursed by you.

Published in Arcane Power , page(s) 124.

name: Hellfire Blood
html:
Hellfire Blood

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls when you use a power that has the fire or the fear keyword.


Update (2/8/2010)
On the Benefit line, delete “feat.” This change ensures that this feat continues to provide a benefit despite changes to the Weapon Expertise and Implement Expertise feats.

Addition (7/28/2008)
Add the word "the" before fear in the Benefits line.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 195.

name: Bardic Knowledge
html:
Bardic Knowledge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Bard
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to Arcana, Dungeoneering, History, Nature, Religion, and Streetwise checks.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 184.

name: Component Modification
html:
Component Modification

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warforged
Benefit : For each warforged component you have, your warforged resolve racial power grants 1 extra temporary hit point, up to a maximum equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 89.

name: Immutability
html:
Immutability

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warforged, Improved Warforged Resolve
Benefit : When you use your warforged resolve racial power, you can make a saving throw against any effect instead of only against an effect that deals ongoing damage. You gain a +2 feat bonus to that saving throw.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 90.

name: Improved Warforged Resolve
html:
Improved Warforged Resolve

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warforged
Benefit : When you use your warforged resolve racial power, you gain 5 extra temporary hit points.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 90.

name: Warforged Tactics
html:
Warforged Tactics

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warforged
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to melee attack rolls against an enemy that is adjacent to an ally.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 93.

name: Improved ImmutabilityImproved Immutability
html:
Improved Immutability

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 12th level, warforged, Immutability feat
Benefit : You gain the improved immutability feat power, which replaces a utility power at level 12, level 16, level 22, or level 26.
In addition, whenever you use your second wind, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws until the end of your turn.


Feat Utility Improved Immutability

Seemingly through your determination alone, your living construct body proves inviolate.

Daily
Immediate Interrupt Personal

Trigger : You are subjected to an effect that a save can end

Effect : You end the triggering effect.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 94.

name: Warforged FortificationWarforged Fortification
html:
Warforged Fortification

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 22nd level, Improved Immutability feat
Benefit : You gain the warforged fortification feat power, which replaces your level 22 utility power.


Feat Utility Warforged Fortification

You’re so tough, sometimes even the worst hits don’t daunt you.

Encounter
Immediate Interrupt Personal

Trigger : A creature scores a critical hit against you

Effect : The triggering attack is instead a normal hit.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 94.

name: Against All Odds
html:
Against All Odds

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wis 13
Benefit : If, at the start of your turn, three or more enemies are adjacent to you, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of your turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 364 , page(s) 53.

name: Thaneborn Advance
html:
Thaneborn Advance

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, barbarian, Thaneborn Triumph class feature
Benefit : When you use your roar of triumph power while you are raging, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and use your new position as the origin square of the burst.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 192.

name: Rageblood Recovery
html:
Rageblood Recovery

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, barbarian, Rageblood Vigor class feature
Benefit : When you hit with the charge attack granted by swift charge while you are raging, you can spend a healing surge as a free action.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 191.

name: Rising Fury
html:
Rising Fury

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Barbarian
Benefit : When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, you gain a +2 feat bonus to weapon damage rolls until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 188.

name: Action Recovery
html:
Action Recovery

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Human
Benefit : When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can immediately make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end.


Revision (7/28/2008)
Replace "gain" with "take", "roll" with "make", & "condition affecting" with "effect on". Remove word "standard" before action. *All in Benefits sentence.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 202.

name: Thaneborn Conqueror
html:
Thaneborn Conqueror

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, barbarian, Thaneborn Triumph class feature
Benefit : When you use your roar of triumph power while raging, any enemy affected by the power’s penalty to defenses also takes a -5 penalty to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 195.

name: Charging Rampage
html:
Charging Rampage

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, barbarian, Rampage class feature
Benefit : When you score a critical hit with a barbarian attack power while you are raging, you can charge as a free action, instead of making a melee basic attack as a result of Rampage.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 190.

name: Enduring Rage
html:
Enduring Rage

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, barbarian, Rageblood Vigor class feature
Benefit : While you are raging, you do not fall unconscious as a result of the dying condition.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 194.

name: Advantage of Cunning
html:
Advantage of Cunning

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Bard, Virtue of Cunning class feature
Benefit : When you slide an ally with your Virtue of Cunning, you can also slide an enemy that was adjacent to that ally into the space the ally vacated.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 184.

name: Human Perseverance
html:
Human Perseverance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to saving throws.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 198.

name: Strength of Valor
html:
Strength of Valor

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Bard, Virtue of Valor class feature
Benefit : When you grant an ally temporary hit points with your Virtue of Valor, that ally also gains a +2 bonus to the next damage roll he or she makes before the end of his or her next turn.


Revision (10/13/2009)
On the Benefit line, replace “your next turn” with “his or her next turn.”

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 189.

name: Improved Majestic Word
html:
Improved Majestic Word

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Bard, majestic word power
Benefit : When you use majestic word, the target of the power gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 186.

name: Rousing Voice
html:
Rousing Voice

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, bard
Benefit : When an ally within 10 squares of you uses second wind, he or she gains also temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Arcane Power , page(s) 129.

name: Improved Cunning
html:
Improved Cunning

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, bard, Virtue of Cunning class feature
Benefit : When you use Virtue of Cunning to slide an ally, you can slide the ally 2 squares instead of 1.

Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Prerequisite : 11th level
Benefit : Choose an encounter attack power from your class. The power must be your level or lower and one that you don’t already have. When you regain the use of your powers at the end of any rest, you can gain the use of the chosen power instead of regaining the use of an encounter attack power of the same level or higher.
Special : Each time you gain a level, you can exchange the power you chose for this feat for another encounter attack power from your class. The power must be your level or lower and one that you don’t already have.

You don’t provoke when you leave an adjacent square to enter the target creature’s space or when you leave the target creature’s space to enter an adjacent square.
You still provoke attacks from other creatures. You can’t end your move in another creature’s space.


Deletion (7/28/2008)
Remove comma after "target creature's space" in last sentence of Benefits line.

name: Angharradh's Favor [Divinity]Angharradh's Favor
html:
Angharradh's Favor [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Angharradh
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Angharradh’s favor.


Feat Utility Angharradh's Favor

Angharradh blesses those who show resolve and determination in the face of evil.

Encounter Divine
No Action Ranged 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : You or an ally within range succeeds on a saving throw

Target : One ally

Effect : The target gains a +4 power bonus to saving throws until the end of his or her next turn.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 132.

name: Avowed Dragonfoe
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn
Benefit : You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against dragons. While you are bloodied, this bonus increases to +2.
Also, when you score a critical hit on a dragon with a melee or close attack, you gain temporary hit points equal to the dragon’s level.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 132.

name: Berronar's Salve [Divinity]Berronar’s Salve
html:
Berronar's Salve [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Berronar
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Berronar’s salve.


Feat Utility Berronar’s Salve

Berronar’s merciful light shines down on a sorely wounded comrade, giving him or her the strength to continue.

Encounter Divine , Healing
Immediate Reaction Ranged 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : An ally drops to 0 hit points or fewer

Target : The triggering ally

Effect : The target can immediately spend a healing surge.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 132.

name: Blessing of Silvanus [Divinity]Blessing of Silvanus
html:
Blessing of Silvanus [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Silvanus
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use blessing of Silvanus.


Feat Utility Blessing of Silvanus

The deep vitality of the Oakfather wells up in your ally’s heart. For a short time, his or her wounds close on their own.

Encounter Divine , Healing
Free Action Close burst 5

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : An ally within 5 squares spends a healing surge

Target : The triggering ally in the burst

Effect : The target heals damage equal to your highest mental ability modifier.

Special : You must take the Blessing of Silvanus feat to use this power.


Revision (2/10/2009)
In the Target line, replace “One ally” with “The triggering ally”.

Deletion (2/10/2009)
Remove the first Special line.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 132.

name: Broken Shackles
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to your Will defense, and a +2 bonus to saving throws against charm effects.

name: Fast Runner

Prerequisite : Con 13

name: Light Step
html:
Light Step

Prerequisite : Elf
Benefit : For the purpose of hourly or daily travel rates, add 1 to your overland speed and the speed of all allies in your traveling group.
Add 5 to the DC required to find or follow your tracks. If traveling with allies, you can share this benefit with up to five other characters.
You gain a +1 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks and Stealth checks.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 198.

name: Chauntea's Blessing [Divinity]Chauntea's Blessing

Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Chauntea’s blessing.


Feat Utility Chauntea's Blessing

Chauntea shields those who fight in her cause. With a single word of encouragement, your comrade rallies.

Encounter Divine
No Action Close burst 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : An ally within 10 squares fails a saving throw

Target : The triggering ally

Effect : The target rerolls the failed saving throw with a +4 power bonus.

name: Clutch of Darkness
html:

Prerequisite : Drow
Benefit : Your cloud of darkness power becomes a burst 2 instead of a burst 1. Your darkfire power becomes ranged 15 instead of ranged 10.

name: Elemental Assault
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, swordmage with aegis of assault
Benefit : When you make a melee basic attack granted by your aegis of assault, you gain a +3 bonus to damage of a type based on your current elemental manifestation.
Earthsoul: Force
Firesoul: Fire
Stormsoul: Thunder
Watersoul: Acid
Windsoul: Cold
If you are currently manifesting more than one element, choose one damage type when making the attack.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 133.

name: Escalating Assault
html:
Escalating Assault

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : swordmage with aegis of assault
Benefit : Each time you make a melee basic attack granted by your aegis of assault power, you gain a cumulative +1 bonus on future attack rolls made for the melee basic attacks granted by this power (up to a maximum bonus of +3). This bonus resets to 0 at the end of the encounter or if you are rendered unconscious.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 133.

name: Extra Manifestation
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi
Benefit : Select a new genasi elemental manifestation. When you take a short rest or an extended rest, you can adopt this new elemental manifestation instead of the one you had been exhibiting.
Special : You can take this feat multiple times, choosing a new manifestation each time. When you take a short rest or an extended rest, you can choose to switch between any of the elemental manifestations you know.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 133.

name: Eyes of Selûne [Divinity]Eyes of Selûne

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Selûne
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use eyes of Selûne.


Feat Utility Eyes of Selûne

Selûne watches over you. When your foes overwhelm you, she
grants a silver flicker of hope.

Encounter Divine
No Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : You fail a saving throw

Hit : You can immediately reroll the saving throw you just failed.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 133.

html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Mielikki
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use fleetness of Mielikki.

Encounter Divine
Minor Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Effect : You gain a +2 power bonus to speed and ignore difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 133.

name: Ghostwise Heritage

Prerequisite : Halfling
Benefit : After meditating for one minute, choose one ally you can see. Whenever that ally is within 10 squares of you, any time you are both required to make a Perception check, both of you can use the higher result of your two rolls.
By meditating again, you can change the ally to whom you are linked.

name: Glittergold's Gambit [Divinity]Glittergold's Gambit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Garl Glittergold
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Glittergold’s gambit.


Feat Utility Glittergold's Gambit

Time and again, Garl Glittergold turned misfortune into unexpected success. He helps one of your allies to do the same.

Encounter Divine
Immediate Interrupt Close burst 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : An ally in the burst makes an attack roll or skill check

Target : One ally in the burst

Effect : The target immediately rerolls the attack roll or skill check he or she just made, but must keep the second result, even if it is worse.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 133.

name: Gold Dwarf Pride
html:

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf
Benefit : If you are reduced to 0 hit points or fewer and return to consciousness in the same encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

html:
Gond's Craft [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Gond
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Gond’s craft.

Gond inspires you with an uncanny understanding of the device or weapon in your hand.

Encounter Divine
Minor Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Effect : You gain a +2 power bonus to any one attack roll made with a magic item power until the end of your next turn.

name: Ilmater's Martyrdom [Divinity]Ilmater's Martyrdom
html:
Ilmater's Martyrdom [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Ilmater
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Ilmater’s martyrdom.


Feat Utility Ilmater's Martyrdom

You give of your own strength so that a wounded ally might endure.

Encounter Divine , Healing
Immediate Reaction Close burst 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger : An ally in the burst is damaged by a critical hit

Target : The ally in the burst damaged by a critical hit

Effect : The target can immediately gain one healing surge and immediately spend it. You lose one healing surge.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 134.

name: Improved Swordbond
html:
Improved Swordbond

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : You can call your bonded weapon to your hand from up to 20 squares away with a minor action.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 134.

name: Intelligent Blademaster
html:
Intelligent Blademaster

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : You can use your Intelligence modifier instead of your Strength modifier when making a basic attack with a melee weapon.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 134.

name: Kelemvor's Judgment [Divinity]Kelemvor's Judgment
html:
Kelemvor's Judgment [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Kelemvor
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Kelemvor’s judgment.


Feat Attack Kelemvor's Judgment

The undead exist in defiance of Kelemvor’s will. You create a blast of brilliant light to burn these abominations into clean death.

Encounter Divine , Implement , Radiant
Standard Action Close blast 5 (8 at 11th level, 10 at 21st level)

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Hit : 1d12 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Increase damage to 2d12 + Wisdom modifier at 5th level, 3d12 + Wisdom modifier at 11th, 4d12 + Wisdom modifier at 15th, 5d12 + Wisdom modifier at 21st, and 6d12 + Wisdom modifier at 25th.

Miss : Half damage.

Prerequisite : Genasi

name: Moon Elf Resilience

Prerequisite : Eladrin
Benefit : If you use your fey step power when you are bloodied and no allies are within 5 squares of you, you can spend a healing surge as a free action.
Special : You cannot select this feat if you have the Sun Elf Grace feat.

name: Oghma's Recall [Divinity]Oghma's Recall

Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Oghma
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Oghma’s recall.

Minor Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Prerequisite : Swordmage with aegis of shielding

name: Righteous Rage of Tempus [Divinity]Righteous Rage of Tempus
html:
Righteous Rage of Tempus [Divinity]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Tempus
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use righteous rage of Tempus.


Feat Utility Righteous Rage of Tempus

Tempus guides your arm and lends weight to your strike.

Encounter Divine
Minor Action Personal

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Effect : If you hit with the next weapon attack that you make before the end of your next turn and it isn't a critical hit, you roll the extra damage dice that you would roll if you scored a critical hit and deal the result as extra damage. If the attack is a critical hit, its extra damage is maximized.


Revision (7/30/2009)
Replace the Effect line with the following
If you hit with the next weapon attack that you make before the end of your next turn and it isn't a critical hit, you roll the extra damage dice that you would roll if you scored a critical hit and deal the result as extra damage. If the attack is a critical hit, its extra damage is maximized.

name: Ruthless Hunter

Prerequisite : Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Sheela Peryroyl
Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Sheela Peryroyl’s gift.

You invoke Sheela Peryroyl’s blessing to free yourself or an ally from some harmful effect.

Minor Action Close burst 10

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Effect : The target immediately rolls a saving throw.

Benefit : When you are adjacent to a bloodied, unconscious, or helpless ally, that ally gains a +2 bonus to saving throws and all defenses. The benefit of this feat doesn’t stack if more than one character with Shield the Fallen is adjacent to the same ally.

name: Stubborn Survivor
html:

Prerequisite : Human

name: Student of Sword Magic
html:
Student of Sword Magic

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Swordmage
Benefit : You have a spellbook in which you record your swordmage spells.
When you choose this feat, select a second swordmage daily attack power for each level at which you already know a swordmage daily attack power, and add those powers to your spellbook. After an extended rest, you can prepare a number of daily spells according to what you can cast per day for your level. You can’t prepare the same spell twice.
Whenever you learn a new level of swordmage daily attack powers, add two different swordmage daily attack spells of that level to your spellbook.
If you retrain a daily swordmage attack power, you replace only one of your two choices for that level. If you replace the power with a power from a different class (through multiclassing) or a swordmage daily attack power of a higher level, you replace both spell choices with the new power or powers.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 136.

name: Sun Elf Grace
html:
Sun Elf Grace

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin
Benefit : If you use your fey step power before you first become bloodied in an encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. Once you’ve become bloodied in an encounter, you can’t gain this benefit even if you are healed later in the fight.
Special : You cannot select this feat if you have the Moon Elf Resilience feat.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 137.

name: Sune's Touch [Divinity]Sune's Touch

Benefit : You can invoke the power of your deity to use Sune’s touch.

Minor Action Close burst 1

Channel Divinity : You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Minor Action Personal

Fortune begets fortune. Misfortune begets fortune. That is the
blessing of Tymora.

No Action Personal

Immediate Interrupt Close burst 10

name: Blade Initiate [Multiclass Swordmage]Swordmage Warding
html:

Prerequisite : Int 13
Benefit : You gain training in the Arcana skill.

In addition, you can use swordmage implements.


Addition (2/10/2009)
At the end of the Benefit section, add “In addition, you can use swordmage implements.”

Addition (1/21/2009)
Add “as a minor action” to the end of the first sentence.

Feat Utility Swordmage Warding

Daily
Minor Action Personal

Effect : While you are wielding a ligt blade or heavy blade you gain a +1 bonus to AC, if one hand is free you gain a +3 bonus to AC. If you go unconscious this feature ends.

Requirement : You must have the Blade Initiate feat to use this feature.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 139.

name: Student of the Plague [Multiclass Spellscarred]
html:
Student of the Plague [Multiclass Spellscarred]

Prerequisite : You have a spellscar
Benefit : You gain the ability to focus your spellscar to useful ends. You qualify for the Novice Power, Acolyte Power, and Adept Power feats, treating spellscarred as the class into which you have multiclassed. You also choose one trait from the following list. (Your DM might create other traits to add to this list, or allow you to devise one of your own.)
•     Sight of the Unseen: You have darkvision extending 1 square in all directions that you can turn on and off at will. When your darkvision is on, your eyes are backlit with a dancing blue flame.
•     Flamespeed: Once per encounter as a minor action, you gain a +1 bonus to speed or a +2 bonus to speed if you charge or run. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn. Blue flame momentarily licks the ground where your feet touch it.
•     Larger than Life: Once per day as a free action, your hands flare with a blue glow and you add 1 to the reach of an attack you make.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide , page(s) 41, 139.

name: Alchemist
html:
Alchemist

Benefit : You can make alchemical items of your level or lower. You must have the correct formula and training in an appropriate skill.
Special : If you receive the Ritual Caster feat as a class feature, you can take the Alchemist feat instead.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide , page(s) 87, Dragon Magazine 399 , Adventurer's Vault , page(s) 21, Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium , page(s) 129.

You gain the shaman’s call spirit companion power, but you use it as a standard action.
Choose a Companion Spirit option. You gain the at-will shaman power associated with that option, such as spirit’s shield or spirit’s fang, as an encounter power.
You gain speak with spirits as a daily power.
In addition, you can wield shaman implements.


Update (4/13/2010)
Replace the third paragraph in the Benefit entry with the following text: “Choose a Companion Spirit option. You gain the at-will shaman power associated that option, such as spirit’s shield or spirit’s fang, as an encounter power.”

Encounter
Free Action Personal

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 23, Dragon Magazine 365 , page(s) 28.

name: Admixture Breath
html:
Admixture Breath

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power, Adaptable Breath feat
Benefit : When you use your dragon breath you can choose for it to deal two types of damage. These damage types must be ones you are capable of delivering with your dragon breath.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24, Dragon Magazine 365 , page(s) 28.

name: Dragonborn ZealDragonborn Zeal
html:
Dragonborn Zeal

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, dragonborn, Dragonborn Frenzy feat
Benefit : When you use your second wind, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Also, the dragonborn zeal racial utility power replaces one of your utility powers. The power it replaces must be 12th level or higher. If you do not yet have a power of 12th level or higher, you can replace the appropriate power when you gain it.


Feat Utility Dragonborn Zeal

Your wounds sometimes make you relentless.

Daily Healing
Immediate Interrupt Personal

Trigger : Your hit points drop to 0 or fewer

Effect : You regain hit points equal to your healing surge value + your Charisma modifier. Add your Charisma modifier as a power bonus to your attack rolls and damage rolls against the enemy that reduced you to 0 hit points or fewer until the end of your next turn.


Revision (10/14/2009)
Replace “Immediate Reaction” with “Immediate Interrupt”.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Dragonborn , page(s) 24, Dragon Magazine 365 , page(s) 28.

name: Implement Expertise
html:
Implement Expertise

Heroic Tier
Benefit : Choose a type of implement. You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls with any implement power you use through that type of implement. The bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, choose a different type of implement.


Update (2/15/2012)
Changed in December 2011 updates.

Published in Player's Handbook 2 , page(s) 185.

name: Arcane Familiar [Familiar]
html:
Arcane Familiar [Familiar]

Prerequisite : Any arcane class
Benefit : You gain a familiar. For each familiar feat you have beyond this one, your familiar gains a +1 bonus to its defenses.

Published in Arcane Power , page(s) 139, Heroes of the Feywild , page(s) 126, Heroes of the Elemental Chaos , page(s) 142.

name: Bonded Familiar [Familiar]
html:
Bonded Familiar [Familiar]

Prerequisite : Any arcane class, Arcane Familiar feat
Benefit : You and your familiar can communicate telepathically out to a range of 10 squares. You must have line of sight and line of effect to your familiar to communicate with it in this manner.

Published in Arcane Power , page(s) 139.

name: Shielding Familiar [Familiar]Shielding Familiar
html:
Shielding Familiar [Familiar]

Prerequisite : Any arcane class, Arcane Familiar feat, 6th-level or higher utility power
Benefit : The shielding familiar feat power replaces one of your 6th-level or higher utility powers.
Also, while your familiar is in its passive state, you gain a +1 bonus to Reflex.


Feat Utility Shielding Familiar

Your familiar leaps to deflect an attack, sacrificing itself to save you.

Daily Arcane
Immediate Interrupt Personal

Requirement : Your familiar must be in its passive state.

Trigger : You are hit by an attack

Effect : The triggering attack deals only half damage to you, and your familiar is destroyed.


Published in Arcane Power , page(s) 139.

name: Spellseer Familiar [Familiar]Spellseer Familiar
html:
Spellseer Familiar [Familiar]

Prerequisite : Any arcane class, Arcane Familiar feat, 6th-level or higher utility power
Benefit : The spellseer familiar feat power replaces one of your 6th-level or higher utility powers.
While your familiar is in its active state, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with arcane powers against targets adjacent to your familiar.


Feat Utility Spellseer Familiar

Your familiar attracts your fruitlessly expended arcane energy, channeling power back to you to allow you to make another attempt.

Daily Arcane
Free Action Personal

Requirement : Your familiar must be in its active state.

Trigger : You miss a target with an arcane encounter attack power

Effect : Reroll the attack roll and use the new result, even if it is lower.


Published in Arcane Power , page(s) 139.

name: Fey Step Trailblazer
html:
Fey Step Trailblazer

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Eladrin
Benefit : When you use your fey step power, you can also teleport one adjacent willing creature that is your size or smaller with you at the same time. When you arrive at your destination, place the creature that traveled with you in any square adjacent to you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 15.

name: Reactive Fey Step
html:
Reactive Fey Step

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Eladrin
Benefit : When you are the target of a push, pull, slide, or other form of forced movement, you can use your fey step power as an immediate interrupt. You negate the forced movement, but you do not teleport.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 15.

name: Sacrifice to Caiphon
html:
Sacrifice to Caiphon

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 13, warlock
Benefit : When you attack with a warlock encounter power that has targets and you miss all targets, then you can deal damage to yourself equal to the level of the power. If you do, you immediately recover the power.


Addition (10/14/2009)
In the first sentence of the Benefit line, add “warlock” before “encounter power”.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 20.

name: Starfire Womb
html:
Starfire Womb

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Cha 13, warlock
Benefit : When you deal damage with a power that has the radiant or fear keyword, immediately roll a saving throw to relieve a condition of your choice from which you are suffering.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 20.

name: Shadow's Eclipse
html:
Shadow's Eclipse

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Int 13, warlock
Benefit : While you have concealment, you also have resist radiant equal to 5 + one-half your level.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 20.

name: Twofold Pact
html:
Twofold Pact

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, Eldritch Pact class feature
Benefit : You gain a second Eldritch Pact. You gain the at-will spell and pact boon of that pact. You can use only one of your pact boon benefits at a time, however.


Update (6/14/2010)
In the second sentence, replace “both pacts” with “that pact.”

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 20.

name: Bael Turath Born
html:
Bael Turath Born

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite : 11th level, tiefling, warlock
Benefit : Your fire resistance improves; you now have resist fire 8 + your level.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 20.

name: Student of the Athanaeum
html:
Student of the Athanaeum

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level, Int 15, warlock
Benefit : Once per day when you use a warlock daily power, you regain the use of that daily power at the end of the encounter.


Addition (10/14/2009)
In the Benefit line, add “warlock” before “daily power”.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual , Dragon Magazine 366 , page(s) 20.

name: Aggressive Assault
html:
Aggressive Assault

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, Brutal Scoundrel class feature, First Strike class feature
Benefit : At the beginning of an encounter, whenever you hit a target that has not yet acted, you slide that target 1 square.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Ankle Cutter
html:
Ankle Cutter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, rogue, Sneak Attack class feature
Benefit : When you hit a Large or larger enemy and would deal Sneak Attack damage against that target, you can forgo rolling Sneak Attack damage and instead cause the target to be slowed until the end of your next turn. Using this option counts as using Sneak Attack for the round.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Beast Guidance
html:
Beast Guidance

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains a +2 feat bonus to any skill in which you are trained.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Beast Protector
html:
Beast Protector

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : If an adjacent enemy makes a melee attack against your beast companion, doing so provokes an opportunity attack from you. If you are adjacent to your beast companion, you can make this attack even if you can’t reach the attacker (you attack the attacker’s reaching limb, for instance).


Update (4/18/2012)
Updated in March 2012.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Beast Training
html:
Beast Training

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains training in a skill. If you change beast companions, you can also change the skill that this feat grants to your beast companion.
Special : You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, your beast companion gains training in a skill.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Bloodied Invigoration
html:
Bloodied Invigoration

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 13, dragonborn, fighter
Benefit : When you hit with a power that has the invigorating keyword while you are bloodied, you gain an additional 2 temporary hit points.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Bold Command
html:
Bold Command

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Halfling, warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit : If an enemy that has combat advantage against you misses with a melee attack, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the start of your next turn.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Bolstering Inspiration
html:
Bolstering Inspiration

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf, warlord
Benefit : When you use inspiring word on an adjacent ally, that ally either regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or can make a saving throw.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Bracing Breath
html:
Bracing Breath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 13, dragonborn, fighter
Benefit : When you use your dragon breath racial power, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls for powers that have the invigorating keyword until the end of your next turn.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Bravura Spirit
html:
Bravura Spirit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit : When a bloodied ally uses your Bravura Presence, that ally gains either a +2 bonus to the attack roll or a +2 bonus to speed for the move action (the ally’s choice).

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Breath-Resistant Beast
html:
Breath-Resistant Beast

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains resist 5 + one-half your level to the damage type of your dragon breath racial power.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 132.

name: Brutal Accuracy
html:
Brutal Accuracy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, ranger, Hunter’s Quarry class feature
Benefit : If the rerolled attack granted by your elven accuracy racial power hits your quarry, the attack deals extra damage equal to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Brutal Teamwork
html:
Brutal Teamwork

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Str 15, dragonborn, rogue
Benefit : You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls when you are adjacent to at least one ally.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Brutal Wound
html:
Brutal Wound

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Rogue, Brutal Scoundrel class feature, Sneak Attack class feature
Benefit : When your attack deals ongoing damage and you deal Sneak Attack damage to the target, add 1 to the ongoing damage for every die of Sneak Attack damage dealt.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Camouflage
html:
Camouflage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, trained in Stealth
Benefit : When you have any cover or concealment outdoors, you gain a +5 feat bonus to Stealth checks.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Command the Darkness
html:
Command the Darkness

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, warlord
Benefit : When you use your cloud of darkness racial power, you can choose for it to lightly or heavily obscure its area, instead of totally obscuring it. If you reduce the darkness in this way, creatures inside the cloud are not blinded.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Coordinated Opportunity
html:
Coordinated Opportunity

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : If your beast companion is adjacent to the target of your opportunity attack, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Cunning Ambusher
html:
Cunning Ambusher

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, rogue
Benefit : If you use infernal wrath when you have combat advantage against the target, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.


Update (4/9/2010)
Replace the Benefit entry with the following text: “If you use infernal wrath when you have combat advantage against the target, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.”

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Darkfire Targeting
html:
Darkfire Targeting

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow ranger or drow rogue
Benefit : Whenever you deal Sneak Attack or Hunter’s Quarry damage to the target of your darkfire power, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Deep Gash
html:
Deep Gash

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Con 15, fighter
Benefit : When you deal ongoing damage that has no damage type to a target as a result of an attack that uses an axe or a pick, the target takes a –2 penalty to saving throws against the ongoing damage.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Dragonborn Frenzy
html:
Dragonborn Frenzy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dragonborn
Benefit : While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 194.

name: Devoted Challenge
html:
Devoted Challenge

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : When you make a melee basic attack granted by Combat Challenge, you gain a bonus to the attack and damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Dragging Flail
html:
Dragging Flail

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dex 15, fighter
Benefit : Whenever you use a flail to knock an enemy prone, you can also slide that enemy 1 square.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Drow Beast Mastery
html:
Drow Beast Mastery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Drow, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion is immune to the effect of your cloud of darkness racial power.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Dwarf Stoneblood
html:
Dwarf Stoneblood

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf, fighter, Battlerager Vigor class feature
Benefit : You gain a +2 feat bonus to the number of temporary hit points you gain from using an invigorating power. The bonus increases to 4 at 11th level and 6 at 21st level.


Revision (7/30/2009)
Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to the number of temporary hit points you gain from using
an invigorating power. The bonus increases to 4 at 11th level and 6 at 21st level.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Dwarf Trapsmith
html:
Dwarf Trapsmith

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Dwarf, rogue
Benefit : You gain a +4 feat bonus to Perception checks to find traps and to Thievery checks to open locks or disable traps.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 133.

name: Elven Beast Mastery
html:
Elven Beast Mastery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion ignores difficult terrain when it shifts.
You can use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll an attack roll you made or one your beast companion made.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 135.

name: Expert Tracker
html:
Expert Tracker

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Wis 13, ranger, trained in Nature
Benefit : You gain a +5 feat bonus to Perception checks to find tracks.
Add 5 to the Perception DC for other creatures to find your tracks. You can extend this benefit to up to ten allies traveling with you.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 135.

name: Fey Blades
html:
Fey Blades

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin, fighter, Tempest Technique class feature
Benefit : When you’re wielding two light blades, two heavy blades, or a heavy blade and a light blade, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 135.

name: Fey Command
html:
Fey Command

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin, warlord, Tactical Presence class feature
Benefit : When an ally you can see spends an action point to make an attack, the ally can teleport 1 square before or after the attack.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Feyborn Companion
html:
Feyborn Companion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Eladrin, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains the fey origin, instead of the natural origin, and a +5 bonus to saving throws against charm effects.
When you use your fey step racial power, your beast companion can teleport the same distance that you teleport.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Fiendish Companion
html:
Fiendish Companion

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Tiefling, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains resistance to fire equal to 5 + one-half your level.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Group Assault
html:
Group Assault

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, fighter
Benefit : Allies gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against targets marked by you.

name: Group Quarry
html:
Group Quarry

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, ranger, Hunter’s Quarry class feature
Benefit : Allies gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against your quarry.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Group Rattling
html:
Group Rattling

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, rogue, trained in Intimidate
Benefit : Allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against enemies that have a penalty to attack rolls as a result of your successful attack with a power that has the rattling keyword.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Human Beast Mastery
html:
Human Beast Mastery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, ranger, Beast Mastery class feature
Benefit : Your beast companion gains a +1 bonus to all defenses.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Hunter of Wind and Wave
html:
Hunter of Wind and Wave

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, ranger
Benefit : When you use your swiftcurrent or windwalker racial power, add 2 squares to the distance the power allows you to move.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Hunter’s Aim
html:
Hunter’s Aim

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Ranger, Hunter’s Quarry class feature
Benefit : You don’t take the normal –2 penalty to attack rolls against your quarry if it has cover or concealment.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Improved Bravura
html:
Improved Bravura

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit : When an ally uses your Bravura Presence, that ally gains either a +1 bonus to the attack roll or a +1 bonus to speed for the move action (the ally’s choice).

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Improved Inspiration
html:
Improved Inspiration

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature
Benefit : Your Inspiring Presence restores an additional 2 hit points.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Triumphant Attack
html:
Triumphant Attack

Epic Tier
Prerequisite : 21st level
Benefit : If you score a critical hit with a melee attack, the target of your attack takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and defenses for the rest of the encounter.


Deletion (10/14/2009)
Remove “(save ends)”.

Published in Player's Handbook , page(s) 207.

name: Improved Resources
html:
Improved Resources

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Resourceful Presence class feature
Benefit : Add 2 to the damage bonus and the temporary hit points granted by your Resourceful Presence.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Improved Tactics
html:
Improved Tactics

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord, Tactical Presence class feature
Benefit : Add 1 to the attack roll bonus granted by your Tactical Presence.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Improved Vigor
html:
Improved Vigor

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Fighter, trained in Endurance
Benefit : You gain a +1 feat bonus to the number of temporary hit points you gain from using an invigorating power. The bonus increases to 2 at 11th level and 3 at 21st level.


Revision (7/30/2009)
Benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to the number of temporary hit points you gain from using an invigorating power. The bonus increases to 2 at 11th level and 3 at 21st level.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Inspired Defense
html:
Inspired Defense

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Human, warlord
Benefit : When you use inspiring word, the target also gains a +1 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 136.

name: Inspired Tactics
html:
Inspired Tactics

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Half-elf, warlord, Inspiring Presence class feature
Benefit : When an ally who can see you spends an action point to make an attack, that ally gains a +1 bonus to the attack roll.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 137.

name: Keeper of Storm
html:
Keeper of Storm

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Genasi, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : If you are manifesting stormsoul when you make a melee basic attack granted by Combat Challenge, you can choose for the attack to deal thunder damage or lightning damage instead of its normal damage type.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 137.

name: Leading Fire
html:
Leading Fire

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Elf, warlord, Combat Leader class feature
Benefit : When you hit an enemy with a bow attack, each ally within 10 squares of you who can see and hear you gains a +1 bonus to ranged attack rolls against the attack’s target until the start of your next turn.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 137.

name: Lend Might
html:
Lend Might

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite : Warlord
Benefit : When an ally makes an attack granted by one of your warlord powers to attack an enemy adjacent to you, that ally gains a +1 bonus to the attack roll.

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 137.

name: Lingering Wrath
html:
Lingering Wrath

Prerequisite : Tiefling, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit : When you use the infernal wrath racial power against an enemy marked by you, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until it is no longer marked by you.


Update (4/9/2010)
In the Benefit entry, replace “the bonuses from infernal wrath” with “a +1 bonus to attack rolls.”

Published in Martial Power , page(s) 137.

name: Longsword Finesse

Longsword Finesse

name: Point-Blank Shot

Point-Blank Shot

name: Lucky Skirmisher

Lucky Skirmisher

name: Martial Alacrity
html:
Martial Alacrity

Prerequisite : Dex 15, any martial class

name: Martial Freedom
html:
Martial Freedom

Heroic Tier

name: Master of Rumbling Earth
html:
Master of Rumbling Earth

name: Nimble Companion
html:
Nimble Companion

When an attack hits your beast companion, you can use your second chance racial power on the beast’s behalf.
